function InitGlobals takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i= 0
    set udg_Timer=CreateTimer()
    set udg_AllUnits=CreateGroup()
    set udg_FakeWindrunners=CreateGroup()
    set i=0
    loop
        exitwhen ( i > 1 )
        set udg_originalNames[i]=""
        set i=i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_NightElfPushers=CreateGroup()
    set i=0
    loop
        exitwhen ( i > 1 )
        set udg_PlayerKIlls[i]=0
        set i=i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_KaliTDUNITs=CreateGroup()
    set udg_KaliTDWAVES=CreateGroup()
    set udg_KaliTDPlayers=CreateGroup()
    set udg_FrostmournesHunger=0

    set udg_TimerDefeat=CreateTimer()
    set udg_LostSoulsPatrol=CreateGroup()
    set udg_VengeanceSpiritGroup=CreateGroup()
    set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
    set i=0
    loop
        exitwhen ( i > 5 )
        set udg_player[i]=0
        set i=i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_TimeSec=1
    set udg_TimeMin=0
    set udg_TimeHour=0
    set udg_MagicSurge=0
    set udg_MirrorEntities=CreateGroup()
    set udg_ElunesTempGroup=CreateGroup()
    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=0
    set udg_MoonlightBlessingString=""
    set udg_PlayersNameLeaver=""
    set udg_DimStepString=""

    endloop

    set udg_EnlightenedShot=0

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Item Tables
//*
//***************************************************************************

function ItemTable000000_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I01D', 34)
        call RandomDistAddItem('I01E', 33)
        call RandomDistAddItem('I01F', 33)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000066_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I00T', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_KelThuzad, 13139)
    set gg_snd_KelThuzad2=CreateSound("Sound\\Dialogue\\HumanCampaign\\Human04\\H04KelThuzad28.mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")

//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralHostile takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p= Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u=CreateUnit(p, 'nwzd', - 2356.2, 4903.7, 24.830)
    set u=CreateUnit(p, 'u01S', 1098.3, - 5175.7, 266.490)
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000129_DropItems)
    set u=CreateUnit(p, 'nwzd', - 1765.9, 5087.2, 31.477)
    set u=CreateUnit(p, 'nwzd', - 2046.0, 5001.4, 146.232)
    set u=CreateUnit(p, 'nwzd', - 1592.7, 4968.7, 261.889)
endfunction

    set gg_unit_hfoo_0200=CreateUnit(p, 'hfoo', 4795.9, 2709.4, 140.446)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_hfoo_0200, ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    set gg_unit_hfoo_0201=CreateUnit(p, 'hfoo', 4003.1, 2701.0, 14.253)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_hfoo_0201, ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    set gg_unit_hkni_0203=CreateUnit(p, 'hkni', 4599.1, 2443.6, 121.816)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_hkni_0203, ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    set gg_unit_hkni_0204=CreateUnit(p, 'hkni', 4793.2, 2530.4, 127.641)
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_hkni_0204, ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    set gg_unit_ndrd_0205=CreateUnit(p, 'ndrd', 1761.7, 6751.5, 108.141)
    set gg_unit_Eevi_0206=CreateUnit(p, 'Eevi', 1565.5, 7168.8, 268.283)
    set gg_unit_Hkal_0207=CreateUnit(p, 'Hkal', 1445.8, 7270.2, 316.581)
    set gg_unit_Hvsh_0208=CreateUnit(p, 'Hvsh', 1676.6, 7283.9, 251.575)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer0()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer1()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer2()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer3()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer4()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer5()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer11()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer5()
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer10()
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer11()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings()
    call CreatePlayerBuildings()
    call CreateNeutralHostile()
    call CreateNeutralPassive()
    call CreatePlayerUnits()
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Cameras
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateCameras takes nothing returns nothing

    set gg_cam_Camera_001=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 304.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1500.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_001, - 1918.6, 1256.1, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_002=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 360.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1200.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_002, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_002, - 1958.1, 1302.1, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_003=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 20.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 60.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 320.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_003, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_003, - 1867.2, 1236.9, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_004=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 180.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 304.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1500.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_004, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_004, - 1873.8, 1212.4, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_005=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 340.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1650.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_005, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_005, 1585.2, 7441.3, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_006=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 304.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 1500.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_006, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************
//TESH.scrollpos=0
//TESH.alwaysfold=0

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Secret ireadthetooltip
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Secret_ireadthetooltip_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5477")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
    call CreateItemLoc('I003', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Secret_ireadthetooltip takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, Player(0), "-ireadthistooltip", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, Player(1), "-ireadthistooltip", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, Player(2), "-ireadthistooltip", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, Player(3), "-ireadthistooltip", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, Player(4), "-ireadthistooltip", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Secret_ireadthetooltip, function Trig_Secret_ireadthetooltip_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Map Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Map_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerFlagBJ(PLAYER_STATE_GIVES_BOUNTY, true, Player(11))
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 500)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 500)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 500)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 500)
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 500)
    call UseTimeOfDayBJ(false)
    call SetTimeOfDay(24.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Map_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Map_Initialization=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Map_Initialization, function Trig_Map_Initialization_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Supporter Items  N Hero Names
//
// Delete variable tempGroup, it may no longer be in use
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "GAGOOOOOOOOOOOO" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "olonavy" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "LightningVortex" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "Apheraz_Lucent" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "FFslayer" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "hlw_rocer" ) ) then
        return false

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == "WrathfulZombie" ) ) then
        return false

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02A', GetEnumUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I028', GetEnumUnit())
        else
            if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02C', GetEnumUnit())
            else
                if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02B', GetEnumUnit())
                else
                    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I027', GetEnumUnit())
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01G', GetEnumUnit())
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I029', GetEnumUnit())
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02E', GetEnumUnit())
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00S', GetEnumUnit())
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02I', GetEnumUnit())
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I028', GetEnumUnit())
                                                call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy)
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01C', GetEnumUnit())
                                                    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy)
                                                else
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Arthas)" ))
    else
        if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Sylvanas)" ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Tyrande)" ))
            else
                if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Grom)" ))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Malfurion)" ))
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Jaina)" ))
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Illidan)" ))
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Lothar)" ))
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call SetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) + " (Akama)" ))
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func001A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos, function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Func002A)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names, 60.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names, function Trig_Supporter_Items__N_Hero_Names_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Support items Wtii
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(- 20, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Support_items_Wtii takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Support_items_Wtii=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Support_items_Wtii, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Support_items_Wtii, Condition(function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Support_items_Wtii, function Trig_Support_items_Wtii_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Supporter items Olonavy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I028') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetAttacker(), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl")
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100, GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Supporter_items_Olonavy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy, Condition(function Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Supporter_items_Olonavy, function Trig_Supporter_items_Olonavy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Priest Wards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_Wards_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Wards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o007', Player(5), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_e000_0008, "cast")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_e000_0008)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priest_Wards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priest_Wards=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Priest_Wards, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Priest_Wards, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Wards_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Priest_Wards, function Trig_Priest_Wards_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then

        return false

function Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4453")
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A02V', gg_unit_H00B_0082)
        set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016)
        call CreateItemLoc('I01P', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    else
        if ( Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4454")
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A02V', gg_unit_H00B_0082)
            set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016)
            call CreateItemLoc('I01P', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
            if ( Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4455")
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A02V', gg_unit_H00B_0082)
                set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016)
                call CreateItemLoc('I01P', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
            else
                if ( Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4456")
                    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A02V', gg_unit_H00B_0082)
                    set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016)
                    call CreateItemLoc('I01P', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Single_Player_Mode_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4457")
                        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A02V', gg_unit_H00B_0082)
                        set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016)
                        call CreateItemLoc('I01P', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', udg_FirstEvo)
        else
            if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', udg_SecondEvo)
            else
                if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', udg_ThirdEvo)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', udg_FourthEvo)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', udg_FifthEvo)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', udg_FirstEvo)
            else
                if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', udg_SecondEvo)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', udg_ThirdEvo)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', udg_FourthEvo)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', udg_FifthEvo)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', udg_FirstEvo)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', udg_SecondEvo)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', udg_ThirdEvo)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', udg_FourthEvo)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', udg_FifthEvo)
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tomes_on_Evo takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tomes_on_Evo=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tomes_on_Evo, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tomes_on_Evo, function Trig_Tomes_on_Evo_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Time
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Time_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TimeMin == 60 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Time_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_TimeSec == 60 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Time_Func003003003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_Time_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TimeSec=( udg_TimeSec + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Time_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_TimeSec=0
        set udg_TimeMin=( udg_TimeMin + 1 )
        if ( Trig_Time_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_TimeMin=0
            set udg_TimeHour=( udg_TimeHour + 1 )
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, ( 2 + CountPlayersInForceBJ(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Time_Func003003003001001))) ), ( ( ( I2S(udg_TimeHour) + " : " ) + ( I2S(udg_TimeMin) + " : " ) ) + I2S(udg_TimeSec) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Time takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Time=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Time, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Time, function Trig_Time_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PlayerInteger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PlayerInteger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_player[1]=2
    set udg_player[2]=3
    set udg_player[3]=4
    set udg_player[4]=5
    set udg_player[5]=6
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PlayerInteger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PlayerInteger=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_PlayerInteger, 0.02)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PlayerInteger, function Trig_PlayerInteger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PlayerLeaveMulti
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PlayerLeaveMulti_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())], "TRIGSTR_4839")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PlayerLeaveMulti takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, Player(0))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, Player(1))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, Player(2))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, Player(3))
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, Player(4))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PlayerLeaveMulti, function Trig_PlayerLeaveMulti_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func004002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func011003003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func012003003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEnumPlayer() == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetEnumPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[1], ( "|c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(1)) + "|r" ) ))
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[1], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[1]))
                call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[1], false, false)
            else
                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[1], ( "|c00FF0303" + ( "Has Left|r" ) ))
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[2], ( "|c000042FF" + ( GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(2)) + "|r" ) ))
                    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[2], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[2]))
                    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[2], false, false)
                else
                    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[2], ( "|c000042FF" + ( "Has Left|r" ) ))
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[3], ( "|c001CE6B9" + ( GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(3)) + "|r" ) ))
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[3], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[3]))
                        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[3], false, false)
                    else
                        call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[3], ( "|c001CE6B9" + ( "Has Left|r" ) ))
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[4], ( "|c00540081" + ( GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(4)) + "|r" ) ))
                            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[4], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[4]))
                            call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[4], false, false)
                        else
                            call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[4], ( "|c00540081" + ( "Has Left|r" ) ))
                        endif
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            if ( Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013Func001Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[5], ( "|c00FFFC01" + ( GetPlayerName(ConvertedPlayer(5)) + "|r" ) ))
                                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[5], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[5]))
                                call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[5], false, false)
                            else
                                call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, udg_player[5], ( "|c00FFFC01" + ( "Has Left|r" ) ))
                            endif
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(1, 1, "TRIGSTR_5860")
    set udg_Multiboard=GetLastCreatedMultiboard()
    call MultiboardSetTitleText(udg_Multiboard, "TRIGSTR_4834")
    call MultiboardSetRowCount(udg_Multiboard, ( 2 + CountPlayersInForceBJ(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func004002003001001))) ))
    call MultiboardSetColumnCount(udg_Multiboard, 4)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_4831")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, 1, 2.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, 1, "TRIGSTR_4832")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, 1, 5.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, 1, "TRIGSTR_4833")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, ( 2 + CountPlayersInForceBJ(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func011003003001001))) ), "TRIGSTR_4835")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, ( 2 + CountPlayersInForceBJ(GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func012003003001001))) ), 8.00)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Func013A)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 1, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 2, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 3, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 4, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 5, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 6, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 7, true, false)
        call MultiboardSetItemColorBJ(udg_Multiboard, GetForLoopIndexA(), 1, 100, 80, 20, 0)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=2
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_Multiboard, 2, GetForLoopIndexA(), 6.00)
        call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, GetForLoopIndexA(), 2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, udg_Multiboard)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Multiboard_creation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Multiboard_creation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Multiboard_creation, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Multiboard_creation, function Trig_Multiboard_creation_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_IconMulti_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001C() ) then
        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHeroDemonHunter.blp")
    else
        if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
            call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNWarden2.blp")
        else
            if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNArthas.blp")
            else
                if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003C() ) then
                    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHellScream.blp")
                else
                    if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNSylvanusWindrunner.blp")
                    else
                        if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                            call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNFurion.blp")
                        else
                            if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                                call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNJaina.blp")
                            else
                                if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
                                    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                                    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNPriestessOfTheMoon.blp")
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                                        call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNAnduinLotharPortrait.blp")
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_IconMulti_Func001Func001Func003Func003Func003Func003Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], false, true)
                                            call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_Multiboard, 1, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))], "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDranaiAkama.blp")
                                        else
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_IconMulti takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_IconMulti=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_IconMulti, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_IconMulti, function Trig_IconMulti_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MultiboardKills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MultiboardKills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetKillingUnitBJ(), Player(10)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MultiboardKills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayerKIlls[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))]=( udg_PlayerKIlls[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))] + 1 )
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(udg_Multiboard, 4, udg_player[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))], I2S(udg_PlayerKIlls[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))]))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MultiboardKills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MultiboardKills=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MultiboardKills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MultiboardKills, Condition(function Trig_MultiboardKills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MultiboardKills, function Trig_MultiboardKills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Common Item Drop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 50) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(8, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_tempPoint)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Common_Item_Drop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Common_Item_Drop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Common_Item_Drop, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Common_Item_Drop, Condition(function Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Common_Item_Drop, function Trig_Common_Item_Drop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Strom Fury Trident
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Strom_Fury_Trident_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I012' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Strom_Fury_Trident_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Strom_Fury_Trident_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01Q') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I002') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I012') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Strom_Fury_Trident_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01Q'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I012'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I002'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I015', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Strom_Fury_Trident takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Strom_Fury_Trident=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Strom_Fury_Trident, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Strom_Fury_Trident, Condition(function Trig_Strom_Fury_Trident_Conditions))

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thunder Trident
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thunder_Trident_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I023' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I012' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I015' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I013' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Trident_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Thunder_Trident_Func011C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01Q') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I015') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I012') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I023') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I013') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Trident_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I023'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I015'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01Q'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I012'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I013'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I024', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

// Trigger: Pure Ruby
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pure_Ruby_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01T' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01R' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pure_Ruby_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pure_Ruby_Func011C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01R') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01Q') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01L') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01Y') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I01T') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pure_Ruby_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01T'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01R'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01Q'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01L'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01Y'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I020', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

function InitTrig_Pure_Ruby takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pure_Ruby=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pure_Ruby, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pure_Ruby, Condition(function Trig_Pure_Ruby_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pure_Ruby, function Trig_Pure_Ruby_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sky Forged Ruby
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I020' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Func008C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02F') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I020') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02F'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I020'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02Q', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sky_Forged_Ruby takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sky_Forged_Ruby=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sky_Forged_Ruby, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sky_Forged_Ruby, Condition(function Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sky_Forged_Ruby, function Trig_Sky_Forged_Ruby_Actions)
endfunction

        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00X'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00B'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00Y', GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)

    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Will of Shadow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I007') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Func001Func003C() ) then
            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 100.00 ))
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\ANrl\\ANrlTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Will_of_Shadow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Will_of_Shadow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Will_of_Shadow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Will_of_Shadow, function Trig_Will_of_Shadow_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Horn of the Throne
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00F') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(120.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Horn_of_the_Throne takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Horn_of_the_Throne=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Horn_of_the_Throne, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Horn_of_the_Throne, Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Horn_of_the_Throne, function Trig_Horn_of_the_Throne_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Golden Cherry Bow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Golden_Cherry_Bow_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I00T') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Golden_Cherry_Bow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Golden_Cherry_Bow_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02Z', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "fanofknives")
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.66, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Golden_Cherry_Bow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Golden_Cherry_Bow=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Golden_Cherry_Bow, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Golden_Cherry_Bow, function Trig_Golden_Cherry_Bow_Actions)
endfunction

    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
