//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Staff 6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02L' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Func010C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02L') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetManipulatingUnit(), 'I02Y') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02L'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02Y'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02Z', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Quest Complete]|r |c00FFFF00[Arcane Staff]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has aquired the |r|cFFE55BB0Arcane Staff|r" ) ))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(150, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Staff_6 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Staff_6=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Staff_6, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Arcane_Staff_6, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Staff_6, function Trig_Arcane_Staff_6_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Sapphire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Sapphire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Sapphire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SapphireINT=0
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Sapphire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Sapphire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Start_Sapphire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Start_Sapphire, Condition(function Trig_Start_Sapphire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Sapphire, function Trig_Start_Sapphire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sapphire Progress
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sapphire_Progress_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_Progress_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c00FF0303" + ( I2S(udg_SapphireINT) + "|r |cff8080ffkills|r |cffff8080(SAPPHIRE QUEST)|r" ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sapphire_Progress takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sapphire_Progress=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sapphire_Progress, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sapphire_Progress, Condition(function Trig_Sapphire_Progress_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sapphire_Progress, function Trig_Sapphire_Progress_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sapphire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sapphire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I00I') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SapphireINT < 35 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sapphire_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SapphireINT=( udg_SapphireINT + 1 )
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I00I'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I030', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Quest Complete]|r |c00FFFF00[Blood Soaked Sapphire]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + "|r" ) ))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01F', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_SapphireINT=0
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_2)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sapphire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sapphire=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sapphire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sapphire, Condition(function Trig_Sapphire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sapphire, function Trig_Sapphire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sapphire 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sapphire_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I030') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SapphireINT < 40 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sapphire_2_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SapphireINT=( udg_SapphireINT + 1 )
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I030'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I031', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Quest Complete]|r |c00FFFF00[Imbued Soul Sapphire]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + "|r" ) ))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01D', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_SapphireINT=0
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_3)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sapphire_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sapphire_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_2)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sapphire_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sapphire_2, Condition(function Trig_Sapphire_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sapphire_2, function Trig_Sapphire_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sapphire_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I031') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_SapphireINT < 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        set udg_SapphireINT=( udg_SapphireINT + 1 )
    else

        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I032', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Quest Complete]|r |c00FFFF00[Pure Soul Sapphire]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + "|r" ) ))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01E', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_SapphireINT=0
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_4)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sapphire 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sapphire_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I032') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_4_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SapphireINT < 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sapphire_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sapphire_4_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SapphireINT=( udg_SapphireINT + 1 )
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'I032'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I033', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_tempPoint, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Quest Complete]|r |c00FFFF00[Sky-Forged Soul Sapphire]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + "|r" ) ))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I003', GetKillingUnitBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        set udg_SapphireINT=0
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_Progress)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Sapphire_4=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sapphire_4)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sapphire_4, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sapphire_4, Condition(function Trig_Sapphire_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sapphire_4, function Trig_Sapphire_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guards Invulnerability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o003' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o004' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o005' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o006' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guards_Invulnerability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guards_Invulnerability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Guards_Invulnerability, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Guards_Invulnerability, Condition(function Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Guards_Invulnerability, function Trig_Guards_Invulnerability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guards Damned Servant Kings Call
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o001' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o002' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o003' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o004' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o005' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o006' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitLoc(udg_FirstBase))
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitLoc(udg_FirstEvo))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call, Condition(function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call, function Trig_Guards_Damned_Servant_Kings_Call_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Retribution Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Retribution_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retribution_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Retribution_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Retribution_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Retribution_Aura, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Retribution_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Retribution_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Retribution_Aura, function Trig_Retribution_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Resilience Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Resilience_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A01W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resilience_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 5)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Resilience_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Resilience_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Resilience_Aura, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Resilience_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Resilience_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Resilience_Aura, function Trig_Resilience_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bless
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bless_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A038' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bless_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bless_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Bless_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Bless_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 90.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Bless_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Bless_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Bless_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bless takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bless=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bless, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bless, Condition(function Trig_Bless_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bless, function Trig_Bless_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Curse
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Curse_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A039' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Curse_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Curse_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Curse_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Curse_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 200.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Curse_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Curse_Func002002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Curse_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Curse takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Curse=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Curse, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Curse, Condition(function Trig_Curse_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Curse, function Trig_Curse_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Resilience Buff
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01W', GetAttacker()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Resilience_Buff_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Resilience_Buff_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_ResilienceTarget=GetAttacker()
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()))
            set udg_ResilienceUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_ResilienceUnit, "cripple", udg_ResilienceTarget)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.60)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_ResilienceUnit)
            call PolledWait(9.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Resilience_Buff takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Resilience_Buff=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Resilience_Buff, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Resilience_Buff, Condition(function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Resilience_Buff, function Trig_Resilience_Buff_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wrath of the Lich King 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_WarthAbility1='A054'
    set udg_Wrathability2='A04A'
    set udg_WrathoftheLichCaster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_WrathoftheLichCaster)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_WrathoftheLichCaster)
    call PolledWait(15.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_WrathoftheLichCaster)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_WrathoftheLichCaster)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1, Condition(function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1, function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wrath of the Lich King SetUnit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_WrathoftheLichCaster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit, Condition(function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit, function Trig_Wrath_of_the_Lich_King_SetUnit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lions Courage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lions_Courage_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AC' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08V' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lions_Courage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lions_Courage_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lions_Courage_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AC' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lions_Courage_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lions_Courage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LionsPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    if ( Trig_Lions_Courage_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_LionsPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('S00S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Lions_Courage_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_LionsPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('S00T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.02)
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), udg_LionsPoint)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetEnumUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_LionsPoint)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lions_Courage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lions_Courage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lions_Courage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lions_Courage, Condition(function Trig_Lions_Courage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lions_Courage, function Trig_Lions_Courage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sunder
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sunder_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Stampede\\StampedeMissileDeath.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 540.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Z', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Z', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Stampede\\StampedeMissileDeath.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 180.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Z', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Stampede\\StampedeMissileDeath.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 90.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08Z', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunder_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FuryQZPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_FuryQZGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_FuryQZPoint, Condition(function Trig_Sunder_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Sunder_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_FuryQZPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_FuryQZGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sunder takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sunder=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sunder, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sunder, Condition(function Trig_Sunder_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunder, function Trig_Sunder_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rend_Q_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A090' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func002002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func002002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Stampede\\StampedeMissileDeath.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), I2R(udg_RendRand), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A090', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Stampede\\StampedeMissileDeath.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A090', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rend_Q_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FuryQZPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_FuryQZGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_FuryQZPoint, Condition(function Trig_Rend_Q_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_RendRand=( GetRandomInt(1, 200) + 650 )
                                call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_RendRand) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                                call ForGroupBJ(udg_FuryQZGroup, function Trig_Rend_Q_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A)
                                set udg_RendTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                                call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_RendTXT, 64, 90)
                                call PolledWait(1.50)
                                call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_RendTXT)
                                call DestroyTextTag(udg_RendTXT)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_FuryQZPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_FuryQZGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rend_Q takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rend_Q=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Rend_Q, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Rend_Q, Condition(function Trig_Rend_Q_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rend_Q, function Trig_Rend_Q_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alliance E
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alliance_E_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A092' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Alliance_E_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetFilterUnit() != GetSpellAbilityUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != GetSpellAbilityUnit())) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != GetSpellAbilityUnit()))), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetFilterUnit() != GetSpellAbilityUnit()))), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true), (GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_E_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_alliancePoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_allianceGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1100.00, udg_alliancePoint, Condition(function Trig_Alliance_E_Func003002003))
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetUnitLoc(GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_allianceGroup)))
    call SetUnitPathing(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_alliancePoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_allianceGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alliance_E takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alliance_E=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Alliance_E, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alliance_E, Condition(function Trig_Alliance_E_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alliance_E, function Trig_Alliance_E_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alliance Passive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'H016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08X', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Allianceint >= 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Allianceint=( udg_Allianceint + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Allianceint=0
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Allianceint=0
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 40.00 ))
            else
                if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_Allianceint=0
                    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 60.00 ))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_Allianceint=0
                        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
                        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 80.00 ))
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_Allianceint=0
                            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
                            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 100.00 ))
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Alliance_Passive_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_Allianceint=0
                                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationTarget.mdl")
                                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 120.00 ))
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alliance_Passive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alliance_Passive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Alliance_Passive, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alliance_Passive, Condition(function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alliance_Passive, function Trig_Alliance_Passive_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A092', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A092', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A092', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A092', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A092', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Allianceint >= 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unity_Passive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Allianceint=( udg_Allianceint + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Allianceint=0
        if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 30.00 ))
            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 15.00 ))
        else
            if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 60.00 ))
                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 30.00 ))
            else
                if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 90.00 ))
                    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 45.00 ))
                else
                    if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 120.00 ))
                        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 60.00 ))
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                            call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 150.00 ))
                            call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 75.00 ))
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                                call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 180.00 ))
                                call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 90.00 ))
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_UnityRand=GetRandomInt(1, 20)
                                    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\StaffOfPurification\\PurificationCaster.mdl")
                                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 210.00 ))
                                    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 105.00 ))
                                    if ( Trig_Unity_Passive_Func003Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func006C() ) then
                                        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 1000.00 ))
                                        call CreateTextTagLocBJ("TRIGSTR_5618", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0, 10, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
                                        set udg_UnityTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                                        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_UnityTXT, 64, 90)
                                        call PolledWait(1.20)
                                        call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_UnityTXT)
                                        call DestroyTextTag(udg_UnityTXT)
                                    else
                                    endif
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unity_Passive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unity_Passive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unity_Passive, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unity_Passive, Condition(function Trig_Unity_Passive_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unity_Passive, function Trig_Unity_Passive_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Epitaph of the Brotherhood
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A093' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), I2R(udg_EpitaphINT), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_EpitaphINT=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) )
    set udg_EpitaPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_EpitaGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_EpitaPoint, Condition(function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func003002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_EpitaGroup, function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Func004A)
    set udg_EpitaphINT=( udg_EpitaphINT / 2 )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + I2R(udg_EpitaphINT) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood, Condition(function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood, function Trig_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forsaken_Fury_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Forsaken_Fury=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Forsaken_Fury, Condition(function Trig_Forsaken_Fury_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Forsaken_Fury, function Trig_Forsaken_Fury_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malice_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A02J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malice_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02J', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malice_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 3) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malice_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Malice_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_MaliceSpawnPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_MaliceTargetPoint=GetSpellTargetLoc()
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_MaliceSpawnPoint, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
            set udg_MaliceUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_MaliceUnit, "shockwave", udg_MaliceTargetPoint)
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_MaliceUnit)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Malice, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Malice, Condition(function Trig_Malice_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malice, function Trig_Malice_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Echoing Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'N007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02K', GetAttacker()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Echoing_Strike_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Echoing_Strike_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_MultishotPosition=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'e00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()))
            set udg_MultishotUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 100.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.60)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_MultishotUnit)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Echoing_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Echoing_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Echoing_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Echoing_Strike, function Trig_Echoing_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean

        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08F', GetAttacker()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08F', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08F', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08F', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01C', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
            if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01D', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
            else
                if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01E', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01F', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 425.00, 425.00))
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01H', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wispers_of_the_Watcher=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wispers_of_the_Watcher, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wispers_of_the_Watcher, Condition(function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wispers_of_the_Watcher, function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watcher_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wispers of the Watchers 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watchers_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01D' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01G' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01H' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watchers_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Wispers_of_the_Watchers_2_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 60.00)
endfunction

endfunction
