endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B017') == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 400.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 500.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondBase, GetEnumUnit(), 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "Spell")
    set udg_ElunesJudgementPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_ElunesTempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_ElunesJudgementPoint, Condition(function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func001A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func001A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func001A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func001A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_ElunesTempGroup, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Func004Func002Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001A)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ElunesJudgementPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_ElunesTempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elunes_Judgement takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elunes_Judgement=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Elunes_Judgement, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Elunes_Judgement, Condition(function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Elunes_Judgement, function Trig_Elunes_Judgement_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moonlight Blessing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B017') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B017') == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 5 )
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 5.00 ))
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 10 )
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 10.00 ))
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
            if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 15 )
                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 15.00 ))
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
                if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                    loop
                        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                        set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 20 )
                        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 20.00 ))
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                    endloop
                else
                    if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 25 )
                            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 25.00 ))
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                            loop
                                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                                set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 30 )
                                call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondBase) + 30.00 ))
                                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                            endloop
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    set udg_MoonlightBlessingString=( "+" + I2S(udg_LucentBlessingINT) )
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingString, udg_SecondBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 100, 0.00, 0)
    set udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT, 64, 90)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
    call PolledWait(2)
    call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT)
    call DestroyTextTag(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT)
    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moonlight_Blessing takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moonlight_Blessing=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Moonlight_Blessing, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Moonlight_Blessing, Condition(function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Moonlight_Blessing, function Trig_Moonlight_Blessing_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lucent Aim
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_SecondEvo) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondEvo)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B01A') != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B01A') != true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondEvo)) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B01A') != true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_LucentAimTempGroup) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_LucentAimPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_SecondEvo)
    set udg_LucentAimTempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_LucentAimPoint, Condition(function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func004002003))
    if ( Trig_Lucent_Aim_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01I', GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondEvo), udg_LucentAimPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_LucentAIMUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitFlyHeightBJ(udg_LucentAIMUnit, 200.00, 400.00)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(3.80, 'BTLF', udg_LucentAIMUnit)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_LucentAIMUnit, "acidbomb", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_LucentAimTempGroup))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_LucentAimPoint)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_LucentAimTempGroup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lucent_Aim takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lucent_Aim=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lucent_Aim, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lucent_Aim, Condition(function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lucent_Aim, function Trig_Lucent_Aim_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: LucentAimDestroy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_LucentAimDestroy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_LucentAIMUnit ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LucentAimDestroy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LucentAimDestroy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LucentAimDestroy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_LucentAimDestroy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_LucentAimDestroy, Condition(function Trig_LucentAimDestroy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_LucentAimDestroy, function Trig_LucentAimDestroy_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondEvo)) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 2625.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 875.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    endif
endfunction

endfunction

    endif

    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 750.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)

    else

    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 750.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 375.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    endif
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08N', udg_SecondEvo) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01A') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 500.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 250.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08N', udg_SecondEvo) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B01A') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 250.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetEnumUnit(), 125.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08N', udg_SecondEvo) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CelestialGTempPoint=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_CelestialGTempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_CelestialGTempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ForGroupBJ(udg_CelestialGTempGroup, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_CelestialGTempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_CelestialGTempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Celestial_Glympse takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Celestial_Glympse=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Celestial_Glympse, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Celestial_Glympse, Condition(function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Celestial_Glympse, function Trig_Celestial_Glympse_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moonlight Wisdom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B01A') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B01A') == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(900.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003C() ) then
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 30 )
            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 30.00 ))
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
    else
        if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 60 )
                call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 60.00 ))
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
        else
            if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                loop
                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 90 )
                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 90.00 ))
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                endloop
            else
                if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                    loop
                        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                        set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 120 )
                        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 120.00 ))
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                    endloop
                else
                    if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                        loop
                            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                            set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 150 )
                            call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 150.00 ))
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                        endloop
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                            loop
                                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                                set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 180 )
                                call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 180.00 ))
                                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                            endloop
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                                set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                                loop
                                    exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                                    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=( udg_LucentBlessingINT + 210 )
                                    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_SecondEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_SecondEvo) + 210.00 ))
                                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                                endloop
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    set udg_MoonlightBlessingString=( "+" + I2S(udg_LucentBlessingINT) )
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingString, udg_SecondEvo, 0, 10, 0.00, 100, 0.00, 0)
    set udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT, 64, 90)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
    call PolledWait(2)
    call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT)
    call DestroyTextTag(udg_MoonlightBlessingTXT)
    set udg_LucentBlessingINT=0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moonlight_Wisdom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moonlight_Wisdom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Moonlight_Wisdom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Moonlight_Wisdom, Condition(function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Moonlight_Wisdom, function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Passive_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08O', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Passive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Moonlight_Wisdom_Passive_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08Q', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: EnlightenedShot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'N00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 'B01A') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', udg_SecondEvo) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.20 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
    else
        if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.30 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
            if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.40 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            else
                if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.50 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                else
                    if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.60 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 0.70 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SecondEvo, GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, true)) * 1.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_EnlightenedShot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_EnlightenedShot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot, Condition(function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot, function Trig_EnlightenedShot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: EnlightenedShot2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A08M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_SecondEvo, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 15)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_EnlightenedShot2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot2, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot2, Condition(function Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_EnlightenedShot2, function Trig_EnlightenedShot2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Furylust
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Furylust_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Furylust_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 40.00, 40.00, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(12.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Furylust takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Furylust=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Furylust, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Furylust, Condition(function Trig_Furylust_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Furylust, function Trig_Furylust_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chaotic Rage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chaotic_Rage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A034' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaotic_Rage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A048', udg_ThirdEvo)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06P', udg_ThirdEvo)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 22.00, 22.00, 22.00, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(12.00)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A048', udg_ThirdEvo)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06P', udg_ThirdEvo)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chaotic_Rage, Condition(function Trig_Chaotic_Rage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chaotic_Rage, function Trig_Chaotic_Rage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warsong Warcry
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A047' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_WarcryCaster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call SetUnitScalePercent(udg_WarcryCaster, 150.00, 150.00, 150.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.75)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(udg_WarcryCaster, 100.00, 100.00, 100.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.25)
    set udg_WarcryPosition=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_WarcryPosition, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
    set udg_WarcryUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_WarcryUnit, "thunderclap")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_WarcryUnit)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Warcry takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry, Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry, function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warsong Warcry Ultimate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A047' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A047', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
        set udg_WarsongWarunit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_WarsongWarunit, "whirlwind")
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_WarsongWarunit, 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_WarsongWarunit)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate, Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate, function Trig_Warsong_Warcry_Ultimate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dreadful Echoes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A049' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A049', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_EchoesUltimate=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_EchoesUltimate, 70.00, 70.00, 70.00, 70.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_EchoesUltimate)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_EchoesPosition=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_EchoesPosition, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_EchoesUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_EchoesUnit, 100, 100, 100, 70.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_EchoesUnit, "spell")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.30)
        call RemoveUnit(udg_EchoesUnit)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dreadful_Echoes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dreadful_Echoes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dreadful_Echoes, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dreadful_Echoes, Condition(function Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dreadful_Echoes, function Trig_Dreadful_Echoes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reign of Chaos
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reign_of_Chaos_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reign_of_Chaos_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ReignofChaosPoint=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_ReignofChaosUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_ReignofChaosUnit)
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_ReignofChaosUnit, "attack")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", udg_ReignofChaosUnit, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Shockwave\\ShockwaveMissile.mdl")
    set udg_ReignOfChaosSpecial=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_ReignOfChaosSpecial)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_ReignofChaosUnit, udg_ReignofChaosPoint)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_ReignofChaosUnit)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reign_of_Chaos takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reign_of_Chaos=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Reign_of_Chaos, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Reign_of_Chaos, Condition(function Trig_Reign_of_Chaos_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reign_of_Chaos, function Trig_Reign_of_Chaos_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Consume Soul
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Consume_Soul_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A097' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Soul_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ConsumeSoultINT > R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Soul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) ) / 2 )
    if ( Trig_Consume_Soul_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit())) * 2 )
        call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) - I2R(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) ))
        set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( udg_ConsumeSoultINT * 2 )
    endif
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + I2R(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) ))
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + ( I2S(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) + "!" ) ), GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
    set udg_ConsumeSoulTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT, 64, 90)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT)
    call DestroyTextTag(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Consume_Soul takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Consume_Soul=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Consume_Soul, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Consume_Soul, Condition(function Trig_Consume_Soul_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Consume_Soul, function Trig_Consume_Soul_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Consume Soul Passive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'O016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ())) <= ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ())) / 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_ConsumeSoulUNIT=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09F', udg_ConsumeSoulUNIT)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_ConsumeSoulUNIT, "bloodlust", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call PolledWait(20.00)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Consume_Soul_Passive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Consume_Soul_Passive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Consume_Soul_Passive, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Consume_Soul_Passive, Condition(function Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Consume_Soul_Passive, function Trig_Consume_Soul_Passive_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blood Oath
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blood_Oath_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) < 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), I2R(udg_BloodOathINT), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Oath_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blood_Oath_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00)
    else
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 50.00 ))
    endif
    set udg_BloodOathINT=( ( ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) ) * 15 ) / 100 )
    set udg_BloodOathPOINT=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_BloodOathPOINT, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func004002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP, function Trig_Blood_Oath_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_BloodOathPOINT)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blood_Oath takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blood_Oath=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blood_Oath, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blood_Oath, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Oath_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blood_Oath, function Trig_Blood_Oath_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blood Burn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blood_Burn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A099' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blood_Burn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BloodBurnINT=R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + I2R(udg_BloodBurnINT) ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blood_Burn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blood_Burn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blood_Burn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blood_Burn, Condition(function Trig_Blood_Burn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blood_Burn, function Trig_Blood_Burn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Essence Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'O018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Essence_Strike_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07D', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 4) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Essence_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( 100 * R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker())) )
        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttacker())) )
        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( 100 - udg_EssenceMissingHP )
        if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005C() ) then
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 2.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 2 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
        else
            if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001C() ) then
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 3.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 3 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 4.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 4 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
                        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 5.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 5 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
                            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 6.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                            call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 6 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Essence_Strike_Func002Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Human\\HumanBlood\\BloodElfSpellThiefBlood.mdl")
                                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP) * 7.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                                call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 7 )) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        set udg_EssenceStrikeTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT, 64, 90)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT)
        call DestroyTextTag(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Essence_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Essence_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Essence_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Essence_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Essence_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Essence_Strike, function Trig_Essence_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forbbidden Sacrifice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A08U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ConsumeSoultINT > R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) ) / 2 )
    if ( Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit())) * 2 )
        call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00)
    else
        call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) - I2R(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) ))
        set udg_ConsumeSoultINT=( udg_ConsumeSoultINT * 2 )
    endif
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + I2R(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) ))
    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( "+" + ( I2S(udg_ConsumeSoultINT) + "!" ) ), GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 10, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
    set udg_ConsumeSoulTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT, 64, 90)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT)
    call DestroyTextTag(udg_ConsumeSoulTXT)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forbbidden_Sacrifice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Forbbidden_Sacrifice, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Forbbidden_Sacrifice, Condition(function Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Forbbidden_Sacrifice, function Trig_Forbbidden_Sacrifice_Actions)
endfunction
