//===========================================================================
function Trig_Broken_Vows_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) < 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), I2R(udg_BloodOathINT), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Broken_Vows_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00)
    else
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 50.00 ))
    endif
    set udg_BloodOathINT=( ( ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) ) * 18 ) / 100 )
    set udg_BloodOathPOINT=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(425.00, udg_BloodOathPOINT, Condition(function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func001002003))
    else
        set udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_BloodOathPOINT, Condition(function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func004Func003002003))
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP, function Trig_Broken_Vows_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_BloodOathPOINT)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_BloodOathUNITGROUP)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Broken_Vows takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Broken_Vows=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Broken_Vows, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Broken_Vows, Condition(function Trig_Broken_Vows_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Broken_Vows, function Trig_Broken_Vows_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Broken Vows Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A09G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09G', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Func003C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09H', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Broken_Vows_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Broken_Vows_Level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Broken_Vows_Level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Broken_Vows_Level, Condition(function Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Broken_Vows_Level, function Trig_Broken_Vows_Level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Last Wisdom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Last_Wisdom_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Wisdom_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09C', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Last_Wisdom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_BloodBurnINT=R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + I2R(udg_BloodBurnINT) ))
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00)
    if ( Trig_Last_Wisdom_Func004C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5961")
        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09D', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(4.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Last_Wisdom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Last_Wisdom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Last_Wisdom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Last_Wisdom, Condition(function Trig_Last_Wisdom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Last_Wisdom, function Trig_Last_Wisdom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Soul Break
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Break_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'O016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Soul_Break_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09B', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 4) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Break_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttacker())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker())) )
        if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 4 )
            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 15 )
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
        else
            if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 8 )
                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 30 )
                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
            else
                if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 12 )
                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 45 )
                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 16 )
                        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                        set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 60 )
                        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                        call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 20 )
                            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                            set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 75 )
                            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                            call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 24 )
                                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                                set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 90 )
                                call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                                call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Soul_Break_Func002Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP * 28 )
                                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP / 100 )
                                    set udg_EssenceMissingHP=( udg_EssenceMissingHP + 80 )
                                    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Critters\\Albatross\\CritterBloodAlbatross.mdl")
                                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), I2R(udg_EssenceMissingHP), ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                                    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) + 50.00 ))
                                    call CreateTextTagLocBJ(( I2S(udg_EssenceMissingHP) + "!" ), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), 0, 10, 100, 0.00, 0.00, 0)
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        set udg_EssenceStrikeTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT, 64, 90)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
        call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT)
        call DestroyTextTag(udg_EssenceStrikeTXT)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Break takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Break=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Soul_Break, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Soul_Break, Condition(function Trig_Soul_Break_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Soul_Break, function Trig_Soul_Break_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Oaths Kept
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_OathsKeptINT=( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) * 20 )
    set udg_OathsKeptINT=( udg_OathsKeptINT / 100 )
    set udg_OathsKeptINT=( ( R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit())) ) / udg_OathsKeptINT )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=udg_OathsKeptINT
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_tempPoint=GetRandomLocInRect(RectFromCenterSizeBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 425.00, 425.00))
        if ( Trig_Oaths_Kept_Func004Func002C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Oaths_Kept_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 30.00)
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
            else
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 20.00, 20.00, 20.00, 30.00)
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
            endif
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 30.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        endif
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Oaths_Kept takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Oaths_Kept=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept, Condition(function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept, function Trig_Oaths_Kept_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Oaths Kept 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00W' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n00V' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Oaths_Kept_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Oaths_Kept_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept_2, Condition(function Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Oaths_Kept_2, function Trig_Oaths_Kept_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hatred
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hatred_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetAttacker() == udg_FifthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HatredINT == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(udg_FifthBase)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09Z', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "bloodlust", udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A0', udg_FifthBase)
    else
        if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A6', udg_FifthBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A7', udg_FifthBase)
            else
                if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A4', udg_FifthBase)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A1', udg_FifthBase)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A5', udg_FifthBase)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A3', udg_FifthBase)
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A9', udg_FifthBase)
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                                        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A8', udg_FifthBase)
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            set udg_HatredINT=( udg_HatredINT + 1 )
                                            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0A2', udg_FifthBase)
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Hatred_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_FifthBase, 100, 40.00, 40.00, 0)
                                            else
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hatred takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hatred=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hatred, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hatred, Condition(function Trig_Hatred_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hatred, function Trig_Hatred_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hatred 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hatred_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(udg_FifthBase, 'B01U') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hatred_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_HatredINT=0
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_FifthBase, 80.00, 80.00, 80.00, 0)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A0', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A2', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A6', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A7', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A4', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A1', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A5', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A3', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A9', udg_FifthBase)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0A8', udg_FifthBase)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hatred_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hatred_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Hatred_2, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hatred_2, Condition(function Trig_Hatred_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hatred_2, function Trig_Hatred_2_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Abhorence Aura
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Abhorence_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 5)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Abhorence_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Abhorence_Aura, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Abhorence_Aura, Condition(function Trig_Abhorence_Aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Abhorence_Aura, function Trig_Abhorence_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unleashed Rage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unleashed_Rage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unleashed_Rage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A07R', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(9.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unleashed_Rage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unleashed_Rage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unleashed_Rage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unleashed_Rage, Condition(function Trig_Unleashed_Rage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unleashed_Rage, function Trig_Unleashed_Rage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demonic Grasp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05E', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DemonicGraspTarget=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_DemonicGraspCaster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_DemonicGraspTargetunit=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call SetUnitPathing(udg_DemonicGraspCaster, false)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_DemonicGraspCaster, udg_DemonicGraspTarget)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_DemonicGraspCaster), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkCaster.mdl")
    if ( Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o00Y', GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_DemonicGraspTarget, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.05)
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "thunderclap")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.05)
    call SetUnitPathing(udg_DemonicGraspCaster, true)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_DemonicGraspCaster, "attack", udg_DemonicGraspTargetunit)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demonic_Grasp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demonic_Grasp=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Demonic_Grasp, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Demonic_Grasp, Condition(function Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demonic_Grasp, function Trig_Demonic_Grasp_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow Dive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_Dive_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0AG' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Dive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CondemnPOINT=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_CondemnPOINT, 90.00)
    set udg_ShadowDiveMissile=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Shadow_Dive=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shadow_Dive, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_Dive_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_Dive, function Trig_Shadow_Dive_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Condemnation Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CondemnPOINT=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_CondemnGROUP=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(200.00, udg_CondemnPOINT, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Func004002003))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Condemnation_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Condemnation_Copy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Condemnation_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Condemnation_Copy, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Condemnation_Copy, function Trig_Condemnation_Copy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Condemnation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Condemnation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitVisible(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MAGIC_IMMUNE) == false)))))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 300.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 250.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 150.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 100.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\Devour\\DevourEffectArt.mdl")
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), 50.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.09)
    set udg_CondemnPOINT=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_CondemnGROUP=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_CondemnPOINT, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_Func005002003))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathandDecay\\DeathandDecayTarget.mdl")
    if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_CondemnGROUP, function Trig_Condemnation_Func007Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Condemnation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Condemnation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Condemnation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Condemnation, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Condemnation, function Trig_Condemnation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sentinel and Jailor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityUnit() == udg_FifthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 200 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 20 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 40 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 60 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 80 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 100 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 120 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 140 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 160 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT == 180 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004Func011C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() != 'A09Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT=( udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT + 1 )
        if ( Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004C() ) then
            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ("TRIGSTR_6410", udg_FifthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
            set udg_SentinelandJailorTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_SentinelandJailorTXT, 64, 90)
            call TriggerSleepAction(2)
            call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_SentinelandJailorTXT)
            call DestroyTextTag(udg_SentinelandJailorTXT)
        else
            if ( Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
                call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
                call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
                call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_FifthBase, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 1)
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6455")
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", udg_FifthBase, "war3mapImported\\Green Light.mdx")
                call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A00W', udg_FifthBase)
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AE', udg_FifthBase)
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0AF', udg_FifthBase)
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06F', udg_FifthBase)
                call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress)
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sentinel_and_Jailor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_ENDCAST)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor, Condition(function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor, function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sentinel and Jailor progress
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_FifthBase) == 'E019' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_FifthBase) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(( I2S(udg_SentinelandJailorstatsINT) + "/200" ), udg_FifthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 0)
        set udg_SentinelandJailorProgressTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_SentinelandJailorProgressTXT, 64, 90)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2)
        call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_SentinelandJailorProgressTXT)
        call DestroyTextTag(udg_SentinelandJailorProgressTXT)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Player(0), "-warden", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Player(1), "-warden", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Player(2), "-warden", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Player(3), "-warden", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Player(4), "-warden", true)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, Condition(function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress, function Trig_Sentinel_and_Jailor_progress_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Condemnation 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Condemnation_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == Player(10) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
        else
            if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 400.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
            else
                if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 600.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 800.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 1000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Condemnation_2_Func001Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), 1200.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Condemnation_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Condemnation_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Condemnation_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Condemnation_2, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Condemnation_2, function Trig_Condemnation_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Condemnation 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Condemnation_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Condemnation_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ShadowsPOINTS=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.02)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), udg_ShadowsPOINTS)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Condemnation_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Condemnation_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Condemnation_3, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Condemnation_3, Condition(function Trig_Condemnation_3_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Condemnation_3, function Trig_Condemnation_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow of Justice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'E019' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07X', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01K', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(10.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
            if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
            else
                if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                        call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
                                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
                                call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
                                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_of_Justice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice, function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow of Justice 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01K' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01Q' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01O' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01N' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_of_Justice_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice_2, Condition(function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_of_Justice_2, function Trig_Shadow_of_Justice_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: D Spells Gold
//===========================================================================
function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A046' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07P' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04C' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A046' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(10, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    else
        if ( Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(11, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        else
            if ( Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(15, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_D_Spells_Gold takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_D_Spells_Gold=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_D_Spells_Gold, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_D_Spells_Gold, Condition(function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_D_Spells_Gold, function Trig_D_Spells_Gold_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remorse Upgrade
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4441")
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Green Light.mdx")
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A046', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04C', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remorse_Upgrade takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remorse_Upgrade=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remorse_Upgrade, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remorse_Upgrade, Condition(function Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remorse_Upgrade, function Trig_Remorse_Upgrade_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A05K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blessing_of_the_Wild_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05K', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blessing_of_the_Wild_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Blessing_of_the_Wild_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06U', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blessing_of_the_Wild takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blessing_of_the_Wild=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dawnwing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dawnwing_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e012' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e011' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e010' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00Z' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00X' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e013' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00Y' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnwing_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dawnwing_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dawnwing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 50.00)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Dawnwing=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Dawnwing, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dawnwing, Condition(function Trig_Dawnwing_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dawnwing, function Trig_Dawnwing_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Yseras Blessing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A055' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A055', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A055', GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetPlayerAbilityAvailableBJ(false, 'A055', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A058', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Yseras_Blessing=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Yseras_Blessing, Condition(function Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Yseras_Blessing, function Trig_Yseras_Blessing_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wisdom 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wisdom_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A05B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A05B', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002C() ) then
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 10)
    else
        if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02F', GetTriggerUnit())
        else
            if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 12)
            else
                if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 12)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Wisdom_2)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Wisdom_1_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                            call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Wisdom_2)
                            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 10)
                            call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A02F', GetTriggerUnit())
                            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 12)
                            call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 12)
                            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Wisdom_3)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wisdom_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wisdom_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wisdom_1, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wisdom_1, Condition(function Trig_Wisdom_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wisdom_1, function Trig_Wisdom_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wisdom 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wisdom_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E00U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Wisdom_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o011', GetTriggerPlayer(), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(20.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wisdom_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wisdom_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Wisdom_2)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Wisdom_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Wisdom_2, Condition(function Trig_Wisdom_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wisdom_2, function Trig_Wisdom_2_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
