//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Empower
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func004002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func004002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 180.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Empower_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Empower_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_ArcaneMissilesTempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call PolledWait(0.50)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_ArcaneMissilesTempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A03X', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(2.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "fanofknives")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_ArcaneMissilesTempPoint)
    else
        if ( Trig_Empower_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
            set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func004002003))
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func005A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
        else
            if ( Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
                call PolledWait(0.15)
                set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
                set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func004002003))
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Empower_Func001Func001Func003Func005A)
                call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
                call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Empower takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Empower=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Empower)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Empower, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Empower, function Trig_Empower_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: EmpowerCast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_EmpowerCast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_EmpowerCast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Empower)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MagicSentry\\MagicSentryCaster.mdl")
    set udg_EmpowerSpecial=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_EmpowerSpecial)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Empower)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_EmpowerCast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_EmpowerCast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_EmpowerCast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_EmpowerCast, Condition(function Trig_EmpowerCast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_EmpowerCast, function Trig_EmpowerCast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mystic Barrier
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 800.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 600.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 475.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 300.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 215.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 130.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07W', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "Spell")
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func003002003))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o019', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(0.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func003A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func003A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func003A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func003A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mystic_Barrier takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mystic_Barrier=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mystic_Barrier, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mystic_Barrier, Condition(function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mystic_Barrier, function Trig_Mystic_Barrier_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dimensional Step
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07V', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_DimensionalStepMana >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
        call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 50.00 ))
        set udg_DimStepString="+50"
        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
        set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
    else
        if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 100.00 ))
            set udg_DimStepString="+100"
            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
            set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
        else
            if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
                call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
                call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 150.00 ))
                set udg_DimStepString="+150"
                call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
                set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
            else
                if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
                    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
                    call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 200.00 ))
                    set udg_DimStepString="+200"
                    call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
                    set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                    call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
                        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
                        call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 250.00 ))
                        set udg_DimStepString="+250"
                        call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
                        set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                        call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Dimensional_Step_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
                            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIma\\AImaTarget.mdl")
                            call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FourthBase, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_FourthBase) + 300.00 ))
                            set udg_DimStepString="+300"
                            call CreateTextTagUnitBJ(udg_DimStepString, udg_FourthBase, 0, 10, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 0)
                            set udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT=GetLastCreatedTextTag()
                            call SetTextTagVelocityBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT, 64, 90)
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_FourthBase, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_FourthBase, false)
    call DestroyTextTagBJ(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT)
    call DestroyTextTag(udg_DimensionalStepManaTXT)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dimensional_Step takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dimensional_Step=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step, Condition(function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step, function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dimensional Step Mana
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Mana_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityUnit() == udg_FourthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Mana_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DimensionalStepMana=( udg_DimensionalStepMana + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dimensional_Step_Mana takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dimensional_Step_Mana=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step_Mana, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step_Mana, Condition(function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Mana_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dimensional_Step_Mana, function Trig_Dimensional_Step_Mana_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Barrage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E01B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07Z', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A083', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Barrage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Barrage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Barrage, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Arcane_Barrage, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Barrage, function Trig_Arcane_Barrage_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 1100.00 ))
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 900.00 ))
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetTriggerUnit()) == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 800.00 ))

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 600.00 ))

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 475.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 300.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 215.00 ))
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Field_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), "Spell")
    set udg_tempPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_tempGroup=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(350.00, udg_tempPoint, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func003002003))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o01A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func003A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func003A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func003A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func003A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func003A)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func003A)
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I018', GetTriggerUnit())
                                call ForGroupBJ(udg_tempGroup, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Func006Func001Func002Func002Func002Func002Func001Func003A)
                            else
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_tempGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Field takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Field=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Field, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Arcane_Field, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Field_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Field, function Trig_Arcane_Field_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magical Surge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magical_Surge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 'E01B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Surge_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MagicSurge >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Surge_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Magical_Surge_Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magical_Surge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Magical_Surge_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_MagicSurge=0
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(40.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetTriggerUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magical_Surge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magical_Surge=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Magical_Surge)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magical_Surge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magical_Surge, Condition(function Trig_Magical_Surge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magical_Surge, function Trig_Magical_Surge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Surge 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSpellAbilityUnit()) == 'E01B' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitInGroup(GetSpellAbilityUnit(), udg_MirrorEntities) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MagicSurge=( udg_MagicSurge + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Surge_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2, function Trig_Magic_Surge_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reality Bend
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reality_Bend_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A081' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reality_Bend_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 5)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reality_Bend takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reality_Bend=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Reality_Bend, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Reality_Bend, Condition(function Trig_Reality_Bend_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reality_Bend, function Trig_Reality_Bend_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reality Bend 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reality_Bend_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A081' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reality_Bend_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_FifthEvo, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_FifthEvo, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reality_Bend_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reality_Bend_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_2, Condition(function Trig_Reality_Bend_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_2, function Trig_Reality_Bend_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reality Bend 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A081' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A081', GetTriggerUnit()) == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A08D', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reality_Bend_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reality_Bend_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_3, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_3, Condition(function Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reality_Bend_3, function Trig_Reality_Bend_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mirror Entity
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mirror_Entity_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 60.00)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_MirrorEntities)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mirror_Entity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mirror_Entity=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Mirror_Entity, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mirror_Entity, Condition(function Trig_Mirror_Entity_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mirror_Entity, function Trig_Mirror_Entity_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mirror Entities Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E01B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01A', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A081' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "replenishlife")
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A080' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "fanofknives")
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_MirrorEntities, function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_MirrorEntities, function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_MirrorEntities, function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Func002Func001Func001Func001A)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mirror_Entities_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mirror_Entities_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mirror_Entities_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mirror_Entities_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mirror_Entities_Cast, function Trig_Mirror_Entities_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Mirror_Entity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_MirrorEntities)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Mirror_Entity, function Trig_Remove_Mirror_Entity_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sum1else tries to egt revive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I011' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_FourthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4593")
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive, Condition(function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive, function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Release REVIVE ALL
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetUnitLoc(GetSpellAbilityUnit()), false)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL, Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL, function Trig_Spirit_Release_REVIVE_ALL_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sum1else tries to egt revive Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_FifthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_egt_revive_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sum1else tries to get Sylv Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func001Func005001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00T' )
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func001Func005002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00U' )
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not GetBooleanOr((GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00T'), (GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00U')) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I01I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_SecondEvo ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    else
        if ( Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01I'))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
            call SetPlayerTechResearchedSwap('R007', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell, function Trig_Sum1else_tries_to_get_Sylv_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aquire Glyph Arthas
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aquire_Glyph_Arthas_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aquire_Glyph_Arthas_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04W', GetTriggerUnit())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2)
endfunction

endfunction

    endif

        return false
    endif

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FrostmournesHunger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FrostmournesHunger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstEvo ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FrostmournesHunger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FrostmournesHunger=( udg_FrostmournesHunger + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FrostmournesHunger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger, Condition(function Trig_FrostmournesHunger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FrostmournesHunger, function Trig_FrostmournesHunger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FrostmourneHungers2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstEvo ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_FrostmournesHunger == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_FrostmournesHunger=0
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", udg_FirstEvo, "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIre\\AIreTarget.mdl")
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_FirstEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 175.00 ))
        call SetUnitManaBJ(udg_FirstEvo, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + 80.00 ))
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FrostmourneHungers2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2, Condition(function Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FrostmourneHungers2, function Trig_FrostmourneHungers2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frostmourne Hungers 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frostmourne_Hungers_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FrostmournesHunger=0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frostmourne_Hungers_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frostmourne_Hungers_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Frostmourne_Hungers_3, 0.01)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frostmourne_Hungers_3, function Trig_Frostmourne_Hungers_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Archers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Archers_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Archers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_221)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00H', Player(11), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_222)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00H', Player(11), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_223)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00H', Player(11), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    set udg_tempPoint=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_224)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00H', Player(11), udg_tempPoint, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_tempPoint)
    call TriggerSleepAction(90.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Archers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Archers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Summon_Archers, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_Archers, Condition(function Trig_Summon_Archers_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_Archers, function Trig_Summon_Archers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: SetTips
//
// |c00FFFF00Yellow|r Legendary
// |c00540081Purple|r Epic
// |c000000FFBlue|r Rare
// |c00106246Green|r Uncommon
// |c007d7d7dGrey|r Common
//===========================================================================
function Trig_SetTips_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Tips[1]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[1/30]|r - |c0096FF96Recipes can be found in the castle.|r"
    set udg_Tips[2]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[2/30]|r - |c0096FF96Consider going for the ruby recipes if you are not very tanky.|r"
    set udg_Tips[3]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[3/30]|r - |c0096FF96At the end of every dungeon a specific hero will evolve.|r"
    set udg_Tips[4]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[4/30]|r - |c0096FF96At the start of every dungeon, a text will display the number of secret rooms the dungeon has to offer.|r"
    set udg_Tips[5]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[5/30]|r - |c0096FF96Sharing items/gold is key.|r"
    set udg_Tips[6]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[6/30]|r - |c0096FF96The original 5 heroes were Arthas, Sylvanas, Grom, Malfurion, Illidan.|r"
    set udg_Tips[7]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[7/30]|r - |c0096FF96Google \"Hero Siege RPG\" and click on the hiveworkshop.com link if you have any comments, suggestions or just want to say hi. Any feedback is appreciated.|r"
    set udg_Tips[8]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[8/30]|r - |c0096FF96Jaina is a little harder to play than Malfurion, but is a little more powerful.|r"
    set udg_Tips[9]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[9/30]|r - |c0096FF96As for as I know, no one has ever beaten this game.|r"
    set udg_Tips[10]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[10/30]|r - |c0096FF96Makemehost.com always has the latest versions of this map.|r"
    set udg_Tips[11]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[11/30]|r - |c0096FF96Did your hero die? Don't worry, heroes are revived after the final boss of every dungeon or by spell the healer gets for completing the first dungeon. But be careful as cooldown for revive is very long!|r"
    set udg_Tips[12]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[12/30]|r - |c0096FF96People who play/host this map a lot and participate in the thread on hiveworkshop.com may receive a contributors item as a special gift for their support.|r"
    set udg_Tips[13]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[13/30]|r - |c0096FF96This map was started in 2013. It was suppose to be a small project that i'd work on for maybe a month.|r"
    set udg_Tips[14]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[14/30]|r - |c0096FF96Your base attribute only increases your damage by 0.5 instead of 1 per point.|r"
    set udg_Tips[15]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[15/30]|r - |c0096FF96This map has been downloaded around 30'000 times since it's release.|r"
    set udg_Tips[16]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[16/30]|r - |c0096FF96Ethereal stones are hidden accross the map you have to find them, if you want the final level of your recipe.|r"
    set udg_Tips[17]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[17/30]|r - |c0096FF96There are many bootleg/hacked versions of this map. The official versions can always be found at Hiveworkshop.com and Makemehost.com.|r"
    set udg_Tips[18]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[18/30]|r - |c0096FF96The priest sells heals and instant mana replenishments. Later on, it will also sell useful buffs.|r"
    set udg_Tips[19]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[19/30]|r - |c0096FF96The map loosely follows the Warcraft III story line.|r"
    set udg_Tips[20]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[20/30]|r - |c0096FF96Item types include: |r|c007d7d7dRecipe Items, |r|c001CE6B9Map Contributor's Items, |r|c00FFFF00Legendary, |r|c00540081Epic, |r|c000000FFRare|r, |c007d7d7dCommon, |r|c0000FF00Set Items|r"
    set udg_Tips[21]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[21/30]|r - |c0096FF96I have a toaster for sale, if you want it please contact me.|r"
    set udg_Tips[22]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[22/30]|r - |c0096FF96Looking for players? Host this map on makemehost.com, games usually get fullhouse in 2-3 minutes max.|r"
    set udg_Tips[23]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[23/30]|r - |c0096FF96This game was inspired by maps such as X Hero Siege, Illidan's 7, DBZ Tribute and a few more.|r"
    set udg_Tips[24]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[24/30]|r - |c0096FF96Mana and maximum regeneration scales much slower in this game, meaning you cannot be careless with your mana usage.|r"
    set udg_Tips[25]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[25/30]|r - |c0096FF96For official changelogs, search for the map thread in Hiveworkshop.com.|r"
    set udg_Tips[26]="|c006969FF[Tips]|r |c00FFFF00[26/30]|r - |c0096FF96The official discord is https://discord.gg/AeaBPsy|r"
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_SetTips takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_SetTips=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_SetTips, function Trig_SetTips_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Show Tips
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Show_Tips_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), udg_Tips[GetRandomInt(1, 30)])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Show_Tips takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Show_Tips=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Show_Tips, 80.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Show_Tips, function Trig_Show_Tips_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Watchers Justice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 10) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I01N') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Watchers_Justice_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Watchers_Justice_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_WatchersPoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_WatchersPoint, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
            set udg_WatchersUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_WatchersUnit, "shadowstrike", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_WatchersUnit)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Watchers_Justice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Watchers_Justice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Watchers_Justice, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Watchers_Justice, Condition(function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Watchers_Justice, function Trig_Watchers_Justice_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Aegis of the Lone Knight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I01P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_AegisLonePoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_AegisLonePoint, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
            set udg_AgeisLoneUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_AgeisLoneUnit, "chainlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.75)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_AgeisLoneUnit)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight, Condition(function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight, function Trig_Aegis_of_the_Lone_Knight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Monsoon Blade Forked Lightning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I02D') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_MonsoonBladePoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_MonsoonBladePoint, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
            set udg_MoonsoonBladeUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ(udg_MoonsoonBladeUnit, "forkedlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.75)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_MoonsoonBladeUnit)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning, Condition(function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning, function Trig_Monsoon_Blade_Forked_Lightning_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hellfire Blade Roar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 5) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I02H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Func001C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            set udg_HellfireBladePoint=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
            call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, 'o015', GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()), udg_HellfireBladePoint, GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()))
            set udg_HellfireBladeUnit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(udg_HellfireBladeUnit, "roar")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.75)
            call RemoveUnit(udg_HellfireBladeUnit)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        else
            call DoNothing()
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hellfire_Blade_Roar=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hellfire_Blade_Roar, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hellfire_Blade_Roar, Condition(function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hellfire_Blade_Roar, function Trig_Hellfire_Blade_Roar_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove corpses
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_corpses_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_corpses_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_corpses=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_corpses, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_corpses, Condition(function Trig_Remove_corpses_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_corpses, function Trig_Remove_corpses_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prevent Progress
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prevent_Progress_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Prevent_Progress_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_001))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prevent_Progress takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prevent_Progress=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prevent_Progress, gg_rct_Region_089)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Prevent_Progress, Condition(function Trig_Prevent_Progress_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prevent_Progress, function Trig_Prevent_Progress_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Castle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Castle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(0), "TRIGSTR_867")
    call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(1), "TRIGSTR_868")
    call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(2), "TRIGSTR_869")
    call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(3), "TRIGSTR_870")
    call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(4), "TRIGSTR_871")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Castle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Castle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Castle, gg_unit_h001_0001, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Castle, gg_unit_h00E_0024, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Castle, function Trig_Castle_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Priest Roam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_Roam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e000_0008, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Priest_Roam, function Trig_Priest_Roam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_e000_0008 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_Roam_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e000_0008, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Priest_Roam_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Priest_Roam_2, 11.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Priest_Roam_2, Condition(function Trig_Priest_Roam_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Priest_Roam_2, function Trig_Priest_Roam_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player 1 Leaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_1_Leaves_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), false)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetEnumUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetEnumUnit())
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_HeroGroup)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos)
    call SetUnitOwner(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267))
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Player_1_Leaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayersNameLeaver=GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( udg_PlayersNameLeaver + "|c00FF0303 has left the game|r" ))
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0184)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Player_1_Leaves_Func004A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_1_Leaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_1_Leaves=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Player_1_Leaves, Player(0))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Player_1_Leaves, function Trig_Player_1_Leaves_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Timer for Pick
//
// The timer here is directly connected to Supporter Items trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Timer_for_Pick_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueNeutralImmediateOrderById(GetEnumPlayer(), gg_unit_n00M_0155, 'H000')
    call IssueNeutralImmediateOrderById(GetEnumPlayer(), gg_unit_n00N_0180, 'N000')
    call IssueNeutralImmediateOrderById(GetEnumPlayer(), gg_unit_n00O_0181, 'O000')
    call IssueNeutralImmediateOrderById(GetEnumPlayer(), gg_unit_n00P_0182, 'E002')
    call IssueNeutralImmediateOrderById(GetEnumPlayer(), gg_unit_n00Q_0183, 'E001')
endfunction

function Trig_Timer_for_Pick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4511")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 60.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4512")
    call ForForce(GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER), function Trig_Timer_for_Pick_Func006A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0182)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00Q_0183)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00M_0155)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00N_0180)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00O_0181)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0182)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0187)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0186)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0184)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0188)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00R_0189)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Timer_for_Pick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Timer_for_Pick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Timer_for_Pick, 0.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Timer_for_Pick, function Trig_Timer_for_Pick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PowerUpBonus
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I005', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r |c0096FF96has found a |r|c0000FF00Power-Up! |r|c0096FF96All heroes receive +3 to all stats. |r" ) ))
    else
        if ( Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c000042FF" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r |c0096FF96has found a |r|c0000FF00Power-Up! |r|c0096FF96All heroes receive +3 to all stats. |r" ) ))
        else
            if ( Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c001CE6B9" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r |c0096FF96has found a |r|c0000FF00Power-Up! |r|c0096FF96All heroes receive +3 to all stats. |r" ) ))
            else
                if ( Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00540081" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r |c0096FF96has found a |r|c0000FF00Power-Up! |r|c0096FF96All heroes receive +3 to all stats. |r" ) ))
                else
                    if ( Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FFFC01" + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r |c0096FF96has found a |r|c0000FF00Power-Up! |r|c0096FF96All heroes receive +3 to all stats. |r" ) ))
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos, function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PowerUpBonus takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PowerUpBonus=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_PowerUpBonus, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_PowerUpBonus, Condition(function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_PowerUpBonus, function Trig_PowerUpBonus_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ArthasPick
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ArthasPick_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ArthasPick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00J', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Awaken\\Awaken.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00M_0155)
    set udg_FirstBase=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H004', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lions_Courage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sunder)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Rend_Q)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alliance_E)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alliance_Passive)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Unity_Passive)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Epitaph_of_the_Brotherhood)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_h018_0194)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0201)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0198)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0199)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0197)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0200)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hkni_0203)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hkni_0204)

    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2)
