    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_JainaPick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00J', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Awaken\\Awaken.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00P_0182)
    set udg_FourthBase=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'E01B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_DimensionalStepMana=0
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_D_Spells_Gold)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Remorse_Upgrade)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Blessing_of_the_Wild)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dawnwing)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Yseras_Blessing)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Wisdom_1)
endfunction

function Trig_MaievPick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00J', GetTriggerUnit())
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetTriggerUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Awaken\\Awaken.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00Q_0183)
    set udg_FifthBase=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'E003', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hatred_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Hatred)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Abhorence_Aura)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Grasp)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MaievPick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MaievPick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_MaievPick, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MaievPick, Condition(function Trig_MaievPick_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MaievPick, function Trig_MaievPick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MaievEvoAdded
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MaievEvoAdded_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E01A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MaievEvoAdded_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_FifthEvo=GetTriggerUnit()
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_PlayingHeroesandEvos)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('tkno', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MaievEvoAdded takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MaievEvoAdded=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_MaievEvoAdded, gg_rct_Region_267)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MaievEvoAdded, Condition(function Trig_MaievEvoAdded_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MaievEvoAdded, function Trig_MaievEvoAdded_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FirstEvolvls
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FirstEvolvls_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FirstEvolvls_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_FirstEvo, ( GetHeroLevel(udg_FirstEvo) + 1 ), false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FirstEvolvls takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FirstEvolvls=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_FirstEvolvls, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_FirstEvolvls, Condition(function Trig_FirstEvolvls_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_FirstEvolvls, function Trig_FirstEvolvls_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: QL
//===========================================================================
function Trig_QL_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4490", "TRIGSTR_4491", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNAnimateDead.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4494", "TRIGSTR_4495", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNLichKing.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4492", "TRIGSTR_4493", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHumanBuild.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4498", "TRIGSTR_4499", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNGolden Crown3.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_4708", "TRIGSTR_4709", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNJewel of Darkness.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_6300", "TRIGSTR_6301", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNDiscordIcon.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_QL takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_QL=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_QL, function Trig_QL_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Send_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing

endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Send_1, function Trig_Send_1_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 1 notice
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_1_notice_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1583")
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2401")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2402")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_1_notice takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1_notice=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1_notice, 5)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1_notice, function Trig_Creep_Wave_1_notice_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_323")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u000', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u000', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u001', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u001', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1, 30.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_1, function Trig_Creep_Wave_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u000', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'u000', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'u001', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u001', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 6 KelThuzad
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_u008_0013, "TRIGSTR_434", null, "TRIGSTR_435", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 13.00, false)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_KelThuzad)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_436")
    call TriggerSleepAction(13.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_384")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_u008_0013, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad, 270.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad, function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_KelThuzad_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 6 Activation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Activation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_u008_0013 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Activation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Tp_Kel)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_6_Activation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Activation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Activation, gg_rct_Region_002)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Activation, Condition(function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Activation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Activation, function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Activation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 6 Summons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'u008' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'u009', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_u008_0013), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIil\\AIilTarget.mdl")
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons, Condition(function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons, function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 6 Summons 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'u009', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u007', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u001', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_u008_0013), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_u008_0013), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\AIil\\AIilTarget.mdl")
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2, gg_unit_u008_0013, LESS_THAN, 1000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2, function Trig_Creep_Wave_6_Summons_2_Actions)
endfunction

    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_KelThuzad2)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_452")
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_u008_0013, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_002))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 7
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_7_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u000', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u009', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u007', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u007', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'u001', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'u003', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)

    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U006', "TRIGSTR_456", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U006_0012), null, "TRIGSTR_471", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 10.00, false)

    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_457")

    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_458")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U006_0012, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 10 MalGanis Infs
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_U006_0012 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), "Units\\Demon\\Infernal\\InfernalBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), "Units\\Demon\\Infernal\\InfernalBirth.mdl")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_n004_0015, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_n004_0016, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_n004_0015, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_n004_0016, false)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs, Condition(function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs, function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Wave 10 MalGanis Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_027))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_027), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_515")
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4526")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies_Func007A)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies, gg_unit_U006_0012, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies, function Trig_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Activate Firebolts
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Activate_Firebolts_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_642")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_708")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_709")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_710")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_711")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_u00A_0022, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_026))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_u00A_0020, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_024))
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_643")
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_279)
    set udg_VisibleZone=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Activate_Firebolts=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Activate_Firebolts, gg_rct_Region_027)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Firebolts, function Trig_Activate_Firebolts_Actions)
endfunction

    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_031), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H002_0014), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_702")
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_u00A_0020)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_u00A_0022)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_bug_fix)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4528")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 18.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(18.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call DestroyFogModifier(udg_VisibleZone)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Paladin_Dies_Func011A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_647")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Paladin_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Paladin_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Paladin_Dies, gg_unit_H002_0014, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Paladin_Dies, function Trig_Paladin_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon bug fix
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_bug_fix_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_bug_fix_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_028))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_bug_fix takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_bug_fix=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_bug_fix, gg_rct_Region_036)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon_bug_fix, Condition(function Trig_Summon_bug_fix_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_bug_fix, function Trig_Summon_bug_fix_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Antonidas Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Antonidas_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_n006_0028)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_h006_0027)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_u00B_0029)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_u00C_0030)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_H003_0018)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_n006_0028, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h006_0027, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_u00B_0029, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_u00C_0030, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H003_0018, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Antonidas_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Antonidas_Initialization=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Antonidas_Initialization, 0.01)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Antonidas_Initialization, function Trig_Antonidas_Initialization_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Antonidas Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Antonidas_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(false, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_036)
    set udg_ArchMageVisiZone=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    call FogModifierStart(udg_ArchMageVisiZone)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_n006_0028)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_H003_0018)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_H003_0018)
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_n006_0028, "attack", GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_HeroGroup))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Antonidas_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Antonidas_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Antonidas_Start, gg_rct_Region_031)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Antonidas_Start, function Trig_Antonidas_Start_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Antonidas Spells
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetAttacker() == gg_unit_H003_0018 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H003_0018, "blizzard", GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()))
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H003_0018, "stop")
    else
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_H003_0018, "chainlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H003_0018, "stop")
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Antonidas_Spells takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Antonidas_Spells=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Antonidas_Spells, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Antonidas_Spells, Condition(function Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Antonidas_Spells, function Trig_Antonidas_Spells_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_038))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Antonidas Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), true)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Func062A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectCaster.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_092), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Silence\\SilenceAreaBirth.mdl")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_703")
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4529")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 15.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(15.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Func014A)
    call FogModifierStop(udg_ArchMageVisiZone)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_705")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CountDown)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_712")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0053, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0054, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0051, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0050, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0052, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0043, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0044, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0045, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0046, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0048, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0049, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0047, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0056, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_u00D_0055, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), 1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CountDown)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_713")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CountDown)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_714")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0054, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0053, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0056, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0055, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0048, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0047, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0049, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0046, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0045, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0044, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0043, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0051, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0050, "defend")
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_u00D_0052, "defend")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CountDown)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_715")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CountDown)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_716")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Func062A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Antonidas_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Antonidas_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Antonidas_Dies, gg_unit_H003_0018, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Antonidas_Dies, function Trig_Antonidas_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Terenas
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Terenas_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetAttacker() == gg_unit_H005_0026 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Terenas_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H005_0026, "stomp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Terenas takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Terenas=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Terenas, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Terenas, Condition(function Trig_Terenas_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas, function Trig_Terenas_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Terenas 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Terenas_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Terenas_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Terenas_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Terenas_2)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Terenas_2, gg_rct_Region_050)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas_2, function Trig_Terenas_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

function Trig_Terenas_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Terenas_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_030))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_FirstBase), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_048), 0.01)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Terenas_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Terenas_3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Terenas_3)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas_3, function Trig_Terenas_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Terenas Low
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Terenas_Low_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01R', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_306), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01R', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_305), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Terenas_Low takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Terenas_Low=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Terenas_Low, gg_unit_H005_0026, LESS_THAN, 2700.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas_Low, function Trig_Terenas_Low_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Terenas Low Attack Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u01R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move, gg_rct_Region_305)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move, gg_rct_Region_306)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move, Condition(function Trig_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move, function Trig_Terenas_Low_Attack_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Terenas Died
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Terenas_Died_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_046), true)
endfunction

function Trig_Terenas_Died_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_729")
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Terenas_Died_Func002A)
    call DestroyFogModifier(udg_ArchMageVisiZone)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, false)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_050), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1666")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, false)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Terenas_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Terenas_3)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Paladin_Divine_Sheild)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Antonidas_Spells)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Terenas)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_KelThuzad)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Skeletal_Mage)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_MalGanis)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Creep_Wave_10_MalGanis_Infs)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Terenas_Died takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Terenas_Died=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Terenas_Died, gg_unit_H005_0026, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Terenas_Died, function Trig_Terenas_Died_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: First Evo Trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H016' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out)
    if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                else
                    if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func003C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_FirstBase)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_280), 0)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_FirstBase, "Stand Channel")
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5849")
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_H09Arthas19)
        call TriggerSleepAction(14.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", udg_FirstBase, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathSmall\\UDeathSmall.mdl")
        call RemoveItem(gg_item_I00G_0060)
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_FirstEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_FirstBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FirstBase, udg_HeroGroup)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FirstBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_048))
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267))
        call RemoveUnit(udg_FirstBase)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=15
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_048), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_048), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_FirstEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstEvo))
    else
        if ( Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_281))
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_FirstBase)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
            call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_280), 0)
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_H02Uther02)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5847")
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase), 'H016', "TRIGSTR_5850", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_281), gg_snd_H02Uther02, "TRIGSTR_5851", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_281), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ReviveHuman\\ReviveHuman.mdl")
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_h018_0194)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_FirstEvo)
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetTriggerUnit())
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_FirstEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase), true)
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_FirstBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FirstBase, udg_HeroGroup)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FirstBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_048))
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FirstEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FirstBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267))
            call RemoveUnit(udg_FirstBase)
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_UtherYesAttack1)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_FirstEvo, "Spell")
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5848")
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstBase), 'H016', "TRIGSTR_5852", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_281), gg_snd_UtherYesAttack1, "TRIGSTR_5853", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hfoo_0198, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hfoo_0201, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hfoo_0199, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hfoo_0197, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hfoo_0200, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hkni_0203, "Stand Victory")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_hkni_0204, "Stand Victory")
            set udg_FirstEvoTransINT=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_FirstEvoTransINT=( udg_FirstEvoTransINT + 10 )
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hfoo_0201, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hfoo_0198, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hfoo_0199, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hfoo_0200, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hfoo_0197, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hkni_0204, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_hkni_0203, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0198)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0201)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0199)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0197)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hfoo_0200)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hkni_0204)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hkni_0203)
            call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_FirstEvo)
            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_FirstEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FirstEvo))
        else
        endif
    endif
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_First_Evo_Trigger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_First_Evo_Trigger=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_First_Evo_Trigger, gg_rct_Region_048)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_First_Evo_Trigger, Condition(function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_First_Evo_Trigger, function Trig_First_Evo_Trigger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ARTHAS EVO teleport out
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FirstEvo ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out, gg_rct_Region_047)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out, Condition(function Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out, function Trig_ARTHAS_EVO_teleport_out_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Send_High_Elf_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Send_High_Elf_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Send_High_Elf_2, gg_rct_Region_022)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Send_High_Elf_2, Condition(function Trig_Send_High_Elf_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Send_High_Elf_2, function Trig_Send_High_Elf_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: High Elf Start 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_High_Elf_Start_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddItemToStockBJ('I01J', gg_unit_e000_0008, 1, 1)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_863")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4530")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 60.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_865")
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(false, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_MASKED, GetPlayableMapRect())
    set udg_BlackMaskVision=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    call FogModifierStart(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'u00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'h008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'h008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'n008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'e004', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'u00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(5, 'h008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n008', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'e004', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'h00C', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BloodElfMageATTACK)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'H00A', "TRIGSTR_1521", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U006_0012), gg_snd_BloodElfMageATTACK, "TRIGSTR_1524", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1265")
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1266")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H00A_0070, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

    set gg_trg_High_Elf_Start_1=CreateTrigger()

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blood Elf Boss Teleports
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blood_Elf_Boss_Teleports_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H00A_0070, true)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H00A_0070), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H00A_0070), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_H00A_0070, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H00A_0070, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_Start_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_052))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_052), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4531")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, true)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_Start_Func006A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0870)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0860)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_XTmx_0869, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_XTmx_0871, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.50)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0869)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0871)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_XTmx_0860, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_XTmx_0870, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_Guardian_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1, 11.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1, function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H009_0061, "stomp")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_H009_0061, "berserk")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H009_0061, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_053))
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_944")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_945")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_946")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_947")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_948")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_972")
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0871)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0869)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_DESTROY, gg_dest_XTmx_0872)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_4)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H009_0061, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_052))
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_XTmx_0872, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian 5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_5_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_H009_0061)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H009_0061), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_H009_0061)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_Guardian_5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_5, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_5, Condition(function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_5_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_5, function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Guardian Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Guardian_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1153")
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guardian_4)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ancient_Guard_Adv_block)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_XTmx_0860)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_XTmx_0870)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_XTmx_0869)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_XTmx_0871)
    call RemoveDestructable(gg_dest_XTmx_0872)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_H009_0061)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_0838)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alleria 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alleria_1_Func015002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Alleria_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(gg_unit_N009_0063, "windwalk")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_N009_0063, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055))
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00A', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_055), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FakeWindrunners, function Trig_Alleria_1_Func015002)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Alleria_1=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alleria_1)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Alleria_1, 17.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alleria_1, function Trig_Alleria_1_Actions)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Sun_Well=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Sun_Well, gg_rct_Region_061)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sun_Well, function Trig_Sun_Well_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Teleport Sun Well Room 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_064))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_064))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1, gg_rct_Region_065)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1, Condition(function Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1, function Trig_Teleport_Sun_Well_Room_1_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Blood elfgineer 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blood_elfgineer_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00E_0145)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00E_0146)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Blood_elfgineer_1=CreateTrigger()

endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: River Sheild Splosion
//===========================================================================
function Trig_River_Sheild_Splosion_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_N00C_0072)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_N00C_0072, true)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_N00C_0072, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_058), 0.01)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 120.00, 120.00, 120.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 200.00, 200.00, 200.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 250.00, 250.00, 250.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 300.00, 300.00, 300.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 350.00, 350.00, 350.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 450.00, 450.00, 450.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "Birth")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_N00C_0072, "death")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o010', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_071), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(gg_unit_N00C_0072, 100.00, 100.00, 100.00)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_N00C_0072, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_N00C_0072)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_River_Sheild_Splosion takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_River_Sheild_Splosion=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_River_Sheild_Splosion, gg_unit_N00C_0072, LESS_THAN, 2000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_River_Sheild_Splosion, function Trig_River_Sheild_Splosion_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: River Sheild SPlosion 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o010' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "thunderclap")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2, gg_rct_Region_071)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2, Condition(function Trig_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2, function Trig_River_Sheild_SPlosion_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sunwell Guard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_dupper2))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sunwell_Guard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard, gg_rct_Region_065)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard, gg_rct_Region_067)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard, gg_rct_Region_069)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard, Condition(function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard, function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sunwell Guard 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_069), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_067), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u002', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_065), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sunwell_Guard_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2, 30.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2, function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sunwell Guard 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h006_0083, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h006_0084, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H00B_0082, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_n00B_0067, true)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(false, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_077)
    set udg_QuelthalasVision=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    call FogModifierStart(udg_QuelthalasVision)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1626")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1627")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sunwell_Guard_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_3, gg_rct_Region_060)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_3, function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u002' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\ReplenishHealth\\ReplenishHealthCaster.mdl")
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_4, function Trig_Sunwell_Guard_4_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MoonKey Steel Drop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MoonKey_Steel_Drop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateItemLoc('I00Q', GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U00I_0074))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MoonKey_Steel_Drop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MoonKey_Steel_Drop=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_MoonKey_Steel_Drop, gg_unit_U00I_0074, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MoonKey_Steel_Drop, function Trig_MoonKey_Steel_Drop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MoonKey PS
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MoonKey_PS_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_PS_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00Q') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_PS_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MoonKey_PS_Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00R'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00Q'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00N', GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MoonKey_PS takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MoonKey_PS=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MoonKey_PS, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MoonKey_PS, Condition(function Trig_MoonKey_PS_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MoonKey_PS, function Trig_MoonKey_PS_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MoonKey SP
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MoonKey_SP_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_SP_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00R') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_SP_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MoonKey_SP_Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00Q'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00R'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00N', GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MoonKey_SP takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MoonKey_SP=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MoonKey_SP, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MoonKey_SP, Condition(function Trig_MoonKey_SP_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MoonKey_SP, function Trig_MoonKey_SP_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: MoonKey PW
//===========================================================================
function Trig_MoonKey_PW_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I00R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_PW_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MoonKey_PW_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_MoonKey_PW_Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00R'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00P'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I00N', GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_MoonKey_PW takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_MoonKey_PW=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_MoonKey_PW, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_MoonKey_PW, Condition(function Trig_MoonKey_PW_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_MoonKey_PW, function Trig_MoonKey_PW_Actions)
endfunction
