//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moonkey Open
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moonkey_Open_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00O') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonkey_Open_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Sunwell_Guard_2)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H00B_0082, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h006_0083, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h006_0084, false)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Taunt\\TauntCaster.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallCaster.mdl")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_2551)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moonkey_Open takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moonkey_Open=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Moonkey_Open, gg_rct_dupper2)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Moonkey_Open, Condition(function Trig_Moonkey_Open_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Moonkey_Open, function Trig_Moonkey_Open_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prince Sunwell Spell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prince_Sunwell_Spell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ(gg_unit_H00B_0082, "polymorph", GetAttacker())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prince_Sunwell_Spell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_Spell=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_Spell, gg_unit_H00B_0082, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_Spell, function Trig_Prince_Sunwell_Spell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prince Summons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prince_Summons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_213), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_213), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h007', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_214), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_214), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Resurrect\\ResurrectTarget.mdl")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prince_Summons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prince_Summons=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Prince_Summons, gg_unit_H00B_0082, LESS_THAN, 4000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prince_Summons, function Trig_Prince_Summons_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prince Summon Send
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prince_Summon_Send_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Prince_Summon_Send_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_124))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prince_Summon_Send takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prince_Summon_Send=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prince_Summon_Send, gg_rct_Region_214)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prince_Summon_Send, gg_rct_Region_213)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Prince_Summon_Send, Condition(function Trig_Prince_Summon_Send_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prince_Summon_Send, function Trig_Prince_Summon_Send_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prince Sunwell DIes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prince_Sunwell_DIes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_Spell)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_n00B_0067, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prince_Sunwell_DIes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_DIes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_DIes, gg_unit_H00B_0082, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prince_Sunwell_DIes, function Trig_Prince_Sunwell_DIes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sunwell Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sunwell_Dies_Func015Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sunwell_Dies_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_124), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Sunwell_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1518")
    call FogModifierStop(udg_QuelthalasVision)
    call FogModifierStart(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, false)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_080), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00B_0067), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_n00B_0067), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallCaster.mdl")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, false)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_n00B_0067)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Sunwell_Dies_Func015A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sunwell_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sunwell_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Sunwell_Dies, gg_unit_n00B_0067, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sunwell_Dies, function Trig_Sunwell_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Second EVO Trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_SecondBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_SecondBase) == 'N00S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(udg_SecondBase) == 'N000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_H004_0078, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Rect_278))
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_SecondBase, gg_unit_H004_0078, 0.01)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H004_0078), 0.01)
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_H004_0078, true)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_SecondBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029))
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_SecondBase, true)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_SecondBase)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitAnimation(udg_SecondBase, "death")
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SylvanasDeath1)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5294")
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(1), 'N000', "TRIGSTR_5311", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), null, "TRIGSTR_5312", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SylavansDeath2Arthas)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5295")
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(0), 'H004', "TRIGSTR_5313", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), null, "TRIGSTR_5314", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Sylvanasdeath3)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5296")
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'N000', "TRIGSTR_5315", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), null, "TRIGSTR_5316", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
        call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_H004_0078, "Spell Throw")
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5297")
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Darksummoning\\DarkSummonTarget.mdl")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
        if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitFacingToFaceUnitTimed(udg_SecondBase, gg_unit_Uwar_0129, 0.01)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_Uwar_0129, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Rect_278))
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), 0.01)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_SecondBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029))
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_SecondBase, true)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_SecondBase)
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_SecondBase, "spell")
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5298")
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_N02Tyrande03)
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase), 'N00S', "TRIGSTR_5305", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), gg_snd_N02Tyrande03, "TRIGSTR_5306", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Uwar_0129, "spell")
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5303")
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_N02Archimonde04)
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'Uwar', "TRIGSTR_5307", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), gg_snd_N02Archimonde04, "TRIGSTR_5308", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5304")
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_JusticeTyrande)
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase), 'N00S', "TRIGSTR_5309", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), gg_snd_JusticeTyrande, "TRIGSTR_5310", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
            call SetUnitAnimation(udg_SecondBase, "spell")
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallCaster.mdl")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_ninf_0143, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
            call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_ninf_0139, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call KillUnit(gg_unit_ninf_0143)
            call KillUnit(gg_unit_ninf_0139)
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Uwar_0129, "spell")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_Uwar_0129)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ninf_0143)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ninf_0139)
        else
        endif
    endif
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, udg_SecondBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, udg_SecondBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, udg_SecondBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, udg_SecondBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, udg_SecondBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, udg_SecondBase)
    call KillUnit(udg_SecondBase)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Func012Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                else
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_SecondEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondBase), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_SecondBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_SecondBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_SecondEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_029))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H004_0078), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_H004_0078)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_SecondBase, udg_HeroGroup)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_SecondBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_SecondEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_SecondEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_SecondEvo))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_079), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(udg_SecondBase)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Second_EVO_Trigger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger, gg_rct_Region_088)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger, Condition(function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Second_EVO_Trigger, function Trig_Second_EVO_Trigger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Teleport out fo sunWell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell, gg_rct_Region_079)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell, Condition(function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell, function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Teleport out fo sunWell 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) )
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_SecondBase )
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11)), (GetTriggerUnit() != udg_SecondBase)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2, gg_rct_Region_080)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2, Condition(function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2, function Trig_Teleport_out_fo_sunWell_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night Elf Push
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_Elf_Push_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddItemToStockBJ('I01K', gg_unit_e000_0008, 1, 1)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1387")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4532")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Cenarius1)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'E00O', "TRIGSTR_1522", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), gg_snd_Cenarius1, "TRIGSTR_1525", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1523")
    call TriggerSleepAction(9.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1389")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(19, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(25.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(25.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(17, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'u00O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(45.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(14, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'e00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'e00Q', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(45.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(7, 'e00Q', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(70.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_SpiritofVengeance)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U00P', "TRIGSTR_1563", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U00P_0131), gg_snd_SpiritofVengeance, "TRIGSTR_1578", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1564")
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1565")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U00P_0131, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night_Elf_Push takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night_Elf_Push=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Night_Elf_Push, gg_unit_n00B_0067, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Night_Elf_Push, function Trig_Night_Elf_Push_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vengeance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vengeance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00Q', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00Q', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vengeance takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vengeance=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Vengeance, 8.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vengeance, function Trig_Vengeance_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vengeance 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vengeance_2_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\DispelMagic\\DispelMagicTarget.mdl")
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_VengeanceSpiritGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_VengeanceSpiritGroup, function Trig_Vengeance_2_Func004A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vengeance_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vengeance_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Vengeance_2, gg_unit_U00P_0131, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vengeance_2, function Trig_Vengeance_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vengeance Remouval
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vengeance_Remouval_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnteringUnit()) == 'u00Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vengeance_Remouval_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetEnteringUnit(), udg_VengeanceSpiritGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Vengeance_Remouval takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval, GetPlayableMapRect())
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval, Condition(function Trig_Vengeance_Remouval_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vengeance_Remouval, function Trig_Vengeance_Remouval_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: D3 Secret Room
//===========================================================================
function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Rect_276))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Rect_277))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_D3_Secret_Room takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_D3_Secret_Room=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_D3_Secret_Room, gg_rct_Rect_275)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_D3_Secret_Room, Condition(function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_D3_Secret_Room, function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_D3_Secret_Room_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_D3_Secret_Room_2_Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Secret Stone In Switch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Secret_Stone_In_Switch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_3775)
    call CreateItemLoc('I02F', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_247))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_247), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Secret_Stone_In_Switch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Secret_Stone_In_Switch, gg_rct_Region_245)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Secret_Stone_In_Switch, function Trig_Secret_Stone_In_Switch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cenarius Open
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cenarius_Open_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_oeye_0132) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_oeye_0133) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_oeye_0134) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_oeye_0135) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_oeye_0136) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cenarius_Open_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cenarius_Open_Func023C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cenarius_Open_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder(gg_unit_e016_0156, "harvest", gg_dest_B000_3333)
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder(gg_unit_e016_0157, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_3346)
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder(gg_unit_e016_0166, "harvest", gg_dest_B000_3335)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_move_attack_to1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_move_attack_to2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_move_attack_to3)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_move_attack_to4)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_D3)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_CenariusChallenge)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'E00O', "TRIGSTR_1610", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), gg_snd_CenariusChallenge, "TRIGSTR_1614", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1611")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1612")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_E00O_0121, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_e00S_0137, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_e00S_0138, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_e00S_0137)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_e00S_0138)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_E00O_0121)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Prevent_Cenarius_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Prevent_Cenarius_2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cenarius_Open takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cenarius_Open=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cenarius_Open, gg_rct_Region_096)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cenarius_Open, Condition(function Trig_Cenarius_Open_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cenarius_Open, function Trig_Cenarius_Open_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon D3 STart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_D3_STart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_E00O_0121, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_e00S_0137, true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_e00S_0138, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_e00S_0137)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_e00S_0138)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_E00O_0121)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_D3)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_D3_STart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_D3_STart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon_D3_STart, gg_rct_Region_096)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_D3_STart, function Trig_Summon_D3_STart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: D3 Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_D3_Start_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096), 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_D3_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1577")
    call FogModifierStop(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4533")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 60.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Cenarius1)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1651")
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_D3_Start_Func010A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00E_0024, Player(5), true)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, Player(11), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_096)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2437")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2438")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2439")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2440")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2441")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'E00O', "TRIGSTR_2444", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), gg_snd_O05Cenarius27, "TRIGSTR_2512", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2445")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_D3_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_D3_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_D3_Start, gg_unit_U00P_0131, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_D3_Start, function Trig_D3_Start_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon D3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_D3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00R', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_189), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00R', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_190), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'e005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_190), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'e005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_189), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Summon_D3=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon_D3)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Summon_D3, 75.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon_D3, function Trig_Summon_D3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cenarius Low
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cenarius_Low_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, gg_unit_E00O_0121)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_E00O_0121, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_E00O_0121)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_E00O_0121, "channel")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01D', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_209), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.70)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01D', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_210), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01D', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_211), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\EntBirthTarget\\EntBirthTarget.mdl")
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.40)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_E00O_0121, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_E00O_0121)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cenarius_Low takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cenarius_Low=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Cenarius_Low, gg_unit_E00O_0121, LESS_THAN, 4000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cenarius_Low, function Trig_Cenarius_Low_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cenrius_Treant_Send, gg_rct_Region_211)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cenarius Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitResetCooldown(GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195), 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func010002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
endfunction

function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
endfunction

function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call FogModifierStart(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1622")
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00E_0024, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h00E_0024, true)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4534")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 20.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(20.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func009A)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func010002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Func011002)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cenarius_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cenarius_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Cenarius_Dies, gg_unit_E00O_0121, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cenarius_Dies, function Trig_Cenarius_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Maze
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Maze_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Maze_Func009Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Maze_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Maze_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Maze_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Debug_Region))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_123), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_123), 0.01)
    if ( Trig_Start_Maze_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_FirstEvo)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_FirstEvo)
    else
        if ( Trig_Start_Maze_Func009Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_Start_Maze_Func009Func001Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Maze takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Maze=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Start_Maze, gg_rct_Debug_Region)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Start_Maze, Condition(function Trig_Start_Maze_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Maze, function Trig_Start_Maze_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mazer Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e009' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1244")
    call PolledWait(2)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096), 0.00)
    if ( Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Func005Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Start_Maze)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mazer_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mazer_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mazer_Dies, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mazer_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mazer_Dies, function Trig_Mazer_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Maze is WON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0100, PLAYER_COLOR_YELLOW)
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0100, PLAYER_COLOR_PURPLE)
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0100, PLAYER_COLOR_CYAN)

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0100, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Start_Maze)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00A_0102)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0091)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0098)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e006_0097)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e006_0096)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0099)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0090)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00A_0105)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e008_0093)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e008_0092)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0095)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0094)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0088)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e007_0087)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e006_0085)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e006_0089)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00A_0103)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00A_0104)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4535")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    if ( Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Func023Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0132)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Maze_is_WON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Maze_is_WON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Maze_is_WON, gg_rct_Region_164)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Maze_is_WON, function Trig_Maze_is_WON_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Maze Terrain Kill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Maze_Terrain_Kill_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Maze_Terrain_Kill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0103, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_130))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0104, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_131))

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0102, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_132))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0105, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_129))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0103, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_130))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00A_0104, "attackground", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_131))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e006_0085, "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_105))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e006_0089, "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_104))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e006_0097, "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_121))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e006_0096, "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_122))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0087, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_097))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0088, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_100))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0094, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_106))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0095, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_102))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e008_0093, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_109))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e008_0092, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_108))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0090, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_113))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0091, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_116))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0098, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_117))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e007_0099, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_119))
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ne_Maze_12, function Trig_Ne_Maze_12_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse randomly move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_randomly_move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00C_0109, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_003))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00C_0110, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_003))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e00C_0108, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_003))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_randomly_move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_randomly_move=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_randomly_move)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Mouse_randomly_move, 6.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_randomly_move, function Trig_Mouse_randomly_move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mouse random start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mouse_random_start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Mouse_randomly_move)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0115, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0115)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mouse_random_start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mouse_random_start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Mouse_random_start, gg_rct_Region_005)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mouse_random_start, function Trig_Mouse_random_start_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cat N Mouse Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_007))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_005), 0.01)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_005), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00C_0109, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_006))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00C_0110, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_006))
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00C_0108, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_006))
    if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_FirstEvo)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_FirstEvo)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Func012Func001Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start, gg_rct_Region_007)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start, Condition(function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_Start_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cat n Mouse FAILED
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4540")
    call PolledWait(2)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096), 0.00)
    call SetItemPositionLoc(gg_item_I00W_0111, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_006))
    if ( Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED, Condition(function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED, function Trig_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cat N Mouse WON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsItemOwned(gg_item_I00W_0111) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0086, PLAYER_COLOR_YELLOW)
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0086, PLAYER_COLOR_PURPLE)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0086, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0133)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1348")
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_Start)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cat_n_Mouse_FAILED)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00C_0109)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00C_0110)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00C_0108)
    if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Func010Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_WON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_WON, gg_rct_Region_005)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_WON, Condition(function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cat_N_Mouse_WON, function Trig_Cat_N_Mouse_WON_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AImlista_Start_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AImlista_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_268))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_011), 0.01)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_011), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0119, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), true)
    if ( Trig_AImlista_Start_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_FirstEvo)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_FirstEvo)
    else
        if ( Trig_AImlista_Start_Func010Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_AImlista_Start_Func010Func001Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AImlista_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AImlista_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_AImlista_Start, gg_rct_Region_268)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_AImlista_Start, Condition(function Trig_AImlista_Start_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AImlista_Start, function Trig_AImlista_Start_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

    endif

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1365")
    call PolledWait(2)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096), 0.00)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0119, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    if ( Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_AImlista_Start)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Aimlista_FAILED takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Aimlista_FAILED=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Aimlista_FAILED, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Aimlista_FAILED, Condition(function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Aimlista_FAILED, function Trig_Aimlista_FAILED_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0019, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
endfunction

function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AImlista_WON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0134)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_AImlista_Start)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Aimlista_FAILED)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1367")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    if ( Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnteringUnit())
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0119)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00I_0118)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00H_0117)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00G_0116)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e00E_0114)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0119)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_AImlista_WON=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_AImlista_WON, gg_rct_Region_013)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_AImlista_WON, function Trig_AImlista_WON_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Aimlista_aim_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_015), 180.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_e00E_0114, "Attack")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ResetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_e00E_0114)
endfunction

endfunction
