//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Memory START
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Memory_START_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_START_Func064Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_START_Func064Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_START_Func064C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_START_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_175))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_174), 0.01)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0124, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4095)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4098)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4099)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4100)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4101)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4114)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4111)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4108)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4137)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4136)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4129)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4106)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4109)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4118)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4117)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4115)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4127)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4124)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4121)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4122)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4123)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4156)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4153)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4142)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4143)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_DTfx_4140)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4140, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4143, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4142, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4153, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4156, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4123, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4122, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4121, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4124, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4127, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4115, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4117, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4118, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4109, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4106, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4129, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4136, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4137, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4108, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4111, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4114, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4101, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4100, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4099, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4098, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call DestructableRestoreLife(gg_dest_DTfx_4095, GetDestructableMaxLife(GetLastCreatedDestructable()), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_172), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    if ( Trig_Memory_START_Func064C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_FirstEvo)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_FirstEvo)
    else
        if ( Trig_Memory_START_Func064Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_Memory_START_Func064Func001Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Memory_START takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Memory_START=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_START, gg_rct_Region_175)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Memory_START, Condition(function Trig_Memory_START_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Memory_START, function Trig_Memory_START_Actions)
endfunction

    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1434")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    if ( Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Func004Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0124, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Memory_START)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Memory_FAILED takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Memory_FAILED=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Memory_FAILED, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Memory_FAILED, Condition(function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Memory_FAILED, function Trig_Memory_FAILED_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0106, PLAYER_COLOR_CYAN)

    endif
    return true

    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0106, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE)
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
    call SetUnitColor(gg_unit_ncop_0106, PLAYER_COLOR_RED)
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_WIN_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1437")
    if ( Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0135)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnteringUnit())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0124)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Memory_START)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Memory_WIN takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Memory_WIN=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_WIN, gg_rct_Region_176)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Memory_WIN, function Trig_Memory_WIN_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Memory Terrain Kill
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Memory_Terrain_Kill_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Memory_Terrain_Kill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Memory_Terrain_Kill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_093)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_094)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_095)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_166)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_167)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_168)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_169)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_170)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_171)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, gg_rct_Region_173)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, Condition(function Trig_Memory_Terrain_Kill_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Memory_Terrain_Kill, function Trig_Memory_Terrain_Kill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cupers Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cupers_Start_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Func034Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Func034C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 3) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cupers_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_Cupers))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_180), 0.01)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0130, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_178))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_177))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.80)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_179))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_177))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_178))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_177))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_179))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_178))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_179))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_177))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_178))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_179))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    if ( Trig_Cupers_Start_Func034C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_177))
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_cup_100)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Cup_win_100)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_186))
    else
        if ( Trig_Cupers_Start_Func034Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_178))
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_cup_010)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Cup_win_010)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_186))
        else
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_179))
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_cup_001)
            call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Cup_win_001)
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e00K_0149, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_186))
        endif
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_180), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(GetLastCreatedUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))
    if ( Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_WarthAbility1, udg_FirstEvo)
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ(udg_Wrathability2, udg_FirstEvo)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037Func001C() ) then
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A002', udg_ThirdBase)
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(udg_ThirdBase, 100, 100.00, 100.00, 0)
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A06O', udg_ThirdBase)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cupers_Start_Func037Func001Func001C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
                call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cupers_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cupers_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cupers_Start, gg_rct_Region_Cupers)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cupers_Start, Condition(function Trig_Cupers_Start_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cupers_Start, function Trig_Cupers_Start_Actions)
endfunction

    endif

function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1473")
    call PolledWait(2)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_096), 0.00)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_oeye_0130, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    if ( Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Cupers_Start)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Cupers_FAILED=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cupers_FAILED, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cupers_FAILED, function Trig_Cupers_FAILED_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Cupers_WON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cupers_Start)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0136)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4579")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00E_0024), 0.01)
    if ( Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_RedsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func002A)
    else
        if ( Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_BluesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func002A)
        else
            if ( Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ(udg_TealsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func002A)
            else
                if ( Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ(udg_PurplesHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func002A)
                else
                    if ( Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ(udg_YellowsHeroGroup, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Func006Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001A)
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_oeye_0130)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnteringUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cupers_WON, gg_rct_Region_185)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cupers_WON, function Trig_Cupers_WON_Actions)

    call KillUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    set gg_trg_cup_100=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_cup_100)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cup_100, gg_rct_Region_183)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_cup_100, gg_rct_Region_182)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_cup_100, function Trig_cup_100_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exit Mano
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exit_Mano_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_ThirdBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exit_Mano_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Exit_Mano_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exit_Mano_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_Mano takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_Mano=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_Mano)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Exit_Mano, gg_rct_Region_049)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Exit_Mano, Condition(function Trig_Exit_Mano_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_Mano, function Trig_Exit_Mano_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mannoroth Low
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mannoroth_Low_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call UnitRemoveBuffsBJ(bj_REMOVEBUFFS_ALL, gg_unit_U00R_0140)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A03J', gg_unit_U00R_0140)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00R_0140, true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U00R_0140, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_196))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_196), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Thunderclap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U00R_0140)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_MannorothLaugh)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_1621")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U00R_0140, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195), 0.01)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "Spell")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00R_0140, "reset")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U00R_0140)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00R_0140, false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mannoroth_Low takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mannoroth_Low=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Mannoroth_Low, gg_unit_U00R_0140, LESS_THAN, 7000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mannoroth_Low, function Trig_Mannoroth_Low_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mannoroth Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mannoroth_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_HPitLordWhat1)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'U00R', "TRIGSTR_2075", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_195), gg_snd_HPitLordWhat1, "TRIGSTR_2079", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3556")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2076")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mannoroth_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mannoroth_Start=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Mannoroth_Start, gg_rct_Region_195)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mannoroth_Start, function Trig_Mannoroth_Start_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mannorth End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mannorth_End_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mannorth_End_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_196), true)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Mannorth_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_Mano)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_THIRD_EVO)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_049), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_h001_0001, false)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Mannorth_End_Func006A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mannorth_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mannorth_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Mannorth_End, gg_unit_U00R_0140, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mannorth_End, function Trig_Mannorth_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00T', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_196), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Summon)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Summon, 14.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon, function Trig_Summon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnteringUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    if ( Trig_Summon2_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(GetEnteringUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
        call RemoveUnit(GetEnteringUnit())
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Summon2, gg_rct_Region_196)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Summon2, Condition(function Trig_Summon2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summon2, function Trig_Summon2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: THIRD EVO
//===========================================================================
function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_ThirdBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'O000' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_198))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_199), 0.01)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Grom25)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6114")
        call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'O000', "TRIGSTR_6122", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_198), gg_snd_O05Grom25, "TRIGSTR_6115", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand first")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_H004_0078), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\HowlOfTerror\\HowlCaster.mdl")
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BloodlustTarget)
        call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "stand second")
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.30)
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetTriggerUnit())
        call KillUnit(udg_ThirdBase)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
        if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
                else
                    if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func023Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                    else
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_ThirdEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase), true)
        call SetUnitOwner(udg_ThirdBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_ThirdBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_ThirdEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_199), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_ThirdBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_ThirdBase, udg_HeroGroup)
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
        call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_ThirdEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdEvo))
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveUnit(udg_ThirdBase)
    else
        if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001C() ) then
            call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_289))
            call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
            call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_005, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 1.00)
            call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_290), 0)
            call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_A07Akama07)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6116")
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(2), 'O018', "TRIGSTR_6119", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_289), gg_snd_A07Akama07, "TRIGSTR_6117", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "Stand - Var4")
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_6118")
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_A07Illidan08)
            call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(4), 'E014', "TRIGSTR_6120", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_289), gg_snd_A07Illidan08, "TRIGSTR_6121", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Eevi_0206, "spell")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hvsh_0208, "spell")
            call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_Hkal_0207, "spell")
            set udg_FirstEvoTransINT=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_FirstEvoTransINT=( udg_FirstEvoTransINT + 10 )
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_Hkal_0207, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_Eevi_0206, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_Hvsh_0208, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrf_0003, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrf_0195, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrs_0007, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrw_0062, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrd_0205, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_ndrf_0185, 100, 100, 100, I2R(udg_FirstEvoTransINT))
                call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_Hkal_0207)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_Eevi_0206)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_Hvsh_0208)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrf_0185)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrd_0205)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrw_0062)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrs_0007)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrf_0195)
            call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_ndrf_0003)
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetTriggerUnit())
            call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetTriggerUnit())
            call KillUnit(udg_ThirdBase)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
            if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
                else
                    if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
                    else
                        if ( Trig_THIRD_EVO_Func004Func001Func037Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                        else
                            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_ThirdEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdBase), true)
            call SetUnitOwner(udg_ThirdBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_ThirdBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_ThirdEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_289), bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_ThirdBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
            call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_ThirdBase, udg_HeroGroup)
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_ThirdEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
            call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_ThirdEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_ThirdEvo))
            call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            call RemoveUnit(udg_ThirdBase)
        else
        endif
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_197), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_THIRD_EVO takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_THIRD_EVO=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_THIRD_EVO)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_THIRD_EVO, gg_rct_Region_200)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_THIRD_EVO, Condition(function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_THIRD_EVO, function Trig_THIRD_EVO_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Grom Exit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Grom_Exit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Grom_Exit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Grom_Exit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Grom_Exit, gg_rct_Region_197)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Grom_Exit, function Trig_Grom_Exit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demon Push
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demon_Push_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2024")
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4570")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(30, 'u00U', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'n00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2039")
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(30, 'u00U', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'n00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'n00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_N03WolfRider13)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3382")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'u00W', "TRIGSTR_3390", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), gg_snd_N03WolfRider13, "TRIGSTR_3383", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'o00T', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(25, 'u00U', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'o00T', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(65.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(25, 'u00U', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n005', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'n00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(12, 'o00T', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'u00W', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'n00F', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u00U', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(10, 'o00T', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_HeroBladeMasterYesAttack3)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U00V', "TRIGSTR_2244", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U00P_0131), gg_snd_HeroBladeMasterYesAttack3, "TRIGSTR_2254", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2245")
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2246")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U00V_0150, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demon_Push takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demon_Push=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Demon_Push, gg_unit_U00R_0140, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Demon_Push, function Trig_Demon_Push_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Move_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_U017_0153 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U017_0153, "attack", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_205))
        call TriggerSleepAction(18.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Unit_Move, gg_rct_Region_208)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Unit_Move, Condition(function Trig_Unit_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unit_Move, function Trig_Unit_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bonus Gold Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bonus_Gold_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateItemLoc('I01O', GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_205))
        call TriggerSleepAction(70.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bonus_Gold_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bonus_Gold_Periodic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Bonus_Gold_Periodic, gg_rct_Region_207)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bonus_Gold_Periodic, function Trig_Bonus_Gold_Periodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Dungeon 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Dungeon_4_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Dungeon_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call FogModifierStop(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4571")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_h00F_0152, Player(5), true)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(false, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_205)
    set udg_TDVision=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    call FogModifierStart(udg_TDVision)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Start_Dungeon_4_Func011A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2268")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2269")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2270")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2271")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2272")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2273")
    call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
    call CinematicModeBJ(true, GetPlayersAll())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(1), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(2), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(4), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), 0)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2373")
    call PolledWait(3.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2374")
    call PolledWait(4.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2375")
    call PolledWait(3.00)
    call CinematicModeBJ(false, GetPlayersAll())
    call CreateItemLoc('I01O', GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_205))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Dungeon_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Dungeon_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Start_Dungeon_4, gg_unit_U00V_0150, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Dungeon_4, function Trig_Start_Dungeon_4_Actions)
endfunction
