//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wave 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wave_1_Func080002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Wave_1_Func081002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207))
endfunction

function Trig_Wave_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2279")
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2280")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u00X', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u00X', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2338")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u00Z', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u00Z', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2339")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u010', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u010', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2340")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u011', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u011', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2351")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u012', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u012', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2397")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u013', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u013', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2410")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u014', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u014', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2447")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u015', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u015', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2448")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=4
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u016', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u016', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(20.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2460")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2467")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_DeathKnightYes1)
    call TransmissionFromUnitWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), gg_unit_U017_0153, "TRIGSTR_2468", gg_snd_DeathKnightYes1, "TRIGSTR_2513", bj_TIMETYPE_SET, 0.00, false)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U017_0153, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_208))
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2506")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u018', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u018', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2523")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01C', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01C', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2514")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u019', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u019', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2515")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01A', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01A', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2848")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01B', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01B', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2516")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u004', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u004', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2849")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2850")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01H', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01H', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2851")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01I', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01I', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2852")
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_203), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_201), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3053")
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_point_K_TD_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_point_K_TD_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_point_K_TD_3)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Move_point_K_TD_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_KaliTDPlayers, function Trig_Wave_1_Func080002)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Wave_1_Func081002)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), 0.01)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(1), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), 0.01)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(2), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), 0.01)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), 0.01)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(Player(4), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), 0.01)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01E_0154, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215))
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Waves_are_done)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_DLyouwillalldrowninlakesofblood)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3384")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(3), 'U01E', "TRIGSTR_3391", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_215), gg_snd_DLyouwillalldrowninlakesofblood, "TRIGSTR_3385", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wave_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wave_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Wave_1, gg_rct_Region_075)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Wave_1, function Trig_Wave_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waves are done
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waves_are_done_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waves_are_done_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waves_are_done takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waves_are_done=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Waves_are_done)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Waves_are_done, gg_rct_Region_201)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Waves_are_done, gg_rct_Region_203)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Waves_are_done, Condition(function Trig_Waves_are_done_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Waves_are_done, function Trig_Waves_are_done_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add creeps
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_creeps_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_creeps_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_KaliTDWAVES)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_creeps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_creeps=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Add_creeps, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_creeps, Condition(function Trig_Add_creeps_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_creeps, function Trig_Add_creeps_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add towers  Wisps
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_KaliTDPlayers)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_towers__Wisps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_towers__Wisps=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Add_towers__Wisps, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_towers__Wisps, Condition(function Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_towers__Wisps, function Trig_Add_towers__Wisps_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Detheroc WW
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Detheroc_WW_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Detheroc_WW_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u01K', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U01E_0154), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01E_0154, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_229))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Detheroc_WW takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Detheroc_WW=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW, gg_unit_U01E_0154, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW, Condition(function Trig_Detheroc_WW_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW, function Trig_Detheroc_WW_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Detheroc WW 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Detheroc_WW_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u01K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Detheroc_WW_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_205))
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Detheroc_WW_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Detheroc_WW_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW_2, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW_2, Condition(function Trig_Detheroc_WW_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Detheroc_WW_2, function Trig_Detheroc_WW_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Detheroc Skeletrons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Detheroc_Skeletrons_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Detheroc_Skeletrons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01L', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_229), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
        call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetLastCreatedUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Detheroc_Skeletrons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Detheroc_Skeletrons=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Detheroc_Skeletrons, gg_unit_U01E_0154, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Detheroc_Skeletrons, Condition(function Trig_Detheroc_Skeletrons_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Detheroc_Skeletrons, function Trig_Detheroc_Skeletrons_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malfurion EVO
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func038A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225), 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Magic_Surge_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Magical_Surge)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase), GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_h00F_0152), 0.01)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FourthBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_220))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_FourthBase)
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_FourthBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_219), 0.01)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_N03Furion23)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3054")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(3), 'E00U', "TRIGSTR_3055", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_207), gg_snd_N03Furion23, "TRIGSTR_3056", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, udg_FourthBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, udg_FourthBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, udg_FourthBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, udg_FourthBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, udg_FourthBase)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, udg_FourthBase)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.60)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_220), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\NightElf\\NEDeathSmall\\NEDeathSmall.mdl")
    if ( Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func020Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                else
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_FourthEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthBase), true)
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_FourthBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_FourthBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_FourthEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_220), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FourthBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FourthBase, udg_HeroGroup)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FourthEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_FourthEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FourthEvo))
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3057")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveUnit(udg_FourthBase)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4574")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 30.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Func038A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3422")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malfurion_EVO takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malfurion_EVO=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Malfurion_EVO, gg_unit_U01E_0154, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malfurion_EVO, function Trig_Malfurion_EVO_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius SPawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_SPawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call FogModifierStop(udg_TDVision)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_S01SatyrOne27)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3396")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3402", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225), gg_snd_S01SatyrOne27, "TRIGSTR_3397", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Xavius_SPawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Xavius_SPawn, gg_rct_Region_225)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_SPawn, function Trig_Xavius_SPawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prevent gates 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prevent_gates_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Prevent_gates_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_230))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Prevent_gates_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Prevent_gates_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prevent_gates_1, gg_rct_Region_226)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Prevent_gates_1, Condition(function Trig_Prevent_gates_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Prevent_gates_1, function Trig_Prevent_gates_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Prevent gates 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Prevent_gates_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Prevent_gates_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Vulenrable Gate Spawns
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns, gg_rct_Region_232)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns, function Trig_Vulenrable_Gate_Spawns_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawns Attack move Gates
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates, gg_rct_Region_228)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates, function Trig_Spawns_Attack_move_Gates_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Spawns Skeles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) != 'e00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) != 'o011' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) != 'o012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01L', Player(11), GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker()), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetAttacker(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles, gg_unit_U01F_0163, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles, Condition(function Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles, function Trig_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Spans Skeles 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavius_Spawns_Skeles)
    call TriggerSleepAction(14.00)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2, gg_unit_U01F_0163, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2, function Trig_Xavius_Spans_Skeles_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Pause 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Pause_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathSmall\\UDeathSmall.mdl")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Forthemaster)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3392")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Spell")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3403", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233), gg_snd_Forthemaster, "TRIGSTR_3393", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233))
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231), 0.01)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00C', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Pause_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_1, gg_unit_U01F_0163, LESS_THAN, 69000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_1, function Trig_Xavius_Pause_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Pause 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Pause_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathSmall\\UDeathSmall.mdl")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Forthemaster)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3399")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Spell")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3404", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233), gg_snd_Forthemaster, "TRIGSTR_3400", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233))
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231), 0.01)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=5
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00C', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Pause_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_2, gg_unit_U01F_0163, LESS_THAN, 60000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_2, function Trig_Xavius_Pause_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Pause 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Pause_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathSmall\\UDeathSmall.mdl")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Forthemaster)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3405")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Spell")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3417", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233), gg_snd_Forthemaster, "TRIGSTR_3406", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233))
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231), 0.01)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=3
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01M', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00C', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_3, gg_unit_U01F_0163, LESS_THAN, 45000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_3, function Trig_Xavius_Pause_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Pause 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Pause_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UDeathSmall\\UDeathSmall.mdl")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Forthemaster)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3407")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Spell")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3418", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233), gg_snd_Forthemaster, "TRIGSTR_3408", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233))
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231), 0.01)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_228), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_226), bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00C', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1791)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_1790)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Pause_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_4, gg_unit_U01F_0163, LESS_THAN, 35000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_4, function Trig_Xavius_Pause_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Pause 5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Pause_5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_N04Satyr29)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3409")
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01F_0163, "Spell")
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01F', "TRIGSTR_3419", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233), gg_snd_N04Satyr29, "TRIGSTR_3410", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_233))
    call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_U01F_0163, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_231), 0.01)
    call CreateItemLoc('I00C', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01F_0163, false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Prevent_gates_2)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_227)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A013', gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A066', gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A06F', gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A04N', gg_unit_U01F_0163)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A05P', gg_unit_U01F_0163)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Pause_5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_5, gg_unit_U01F_0163, LESS_THAN, 23000.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Pause_5, function Trig_Xavius_Pause_5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavius Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavius_Dies_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavius_Dies_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( (true) ) then // INLINED!!
        call ReviveHeroLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225), true)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_225), 0)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Xavius_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call FogModifierStart(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_234), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Xavius_Dies_Func005A)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavius_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavius_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Xavius_Dies, gg_unit_U01F_0163, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavius_Dies, function Trig_Xavius_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavisu TP OUT
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_FifthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), 0)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavisu_TP_OUT takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT, gg_rct_Region_234)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT, Condition(function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT, function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Xavisu TP OUT Illidan
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_FifthBase ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_248), 0)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan, gg_rct_Region_235)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan, Condition(function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan, function Trig_Xavisu_TP_OUT_Illidan_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ILLIDAN EVO TRIGGER
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_248), 0)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_002, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0.01)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Illidan1)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3488")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249))
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_003, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 13.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(14.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Illidan2)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3489")
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_004, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 3.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.50)
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "Spell")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitScalePercent(GetTriggerUnit(), 110.00, 110.00, 110.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 50.00, 50.00, 50.00, 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.30)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\TomeOfRetraining\\TomeOfRetrainingCaster.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", gg_unit_n00K_0164, "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\AncestralSpirit\\AncestralSpiritCaster.mdl")
    call SetUnitAnimation(GetTriggerUnit(), "Morph")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_n00K_0164)
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(1, GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(2, GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(3, GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(4, GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(5, GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveItemFromSlotSwapped(6, GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032C() ) then
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_RedsHeroGroup)
    else
        if ( Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001C() ) then
            call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_BluesHeroGroup)
        else
            if ( Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001Func001C() ) then
                call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_TealsHeroGroup)
            else
                if ( Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Func032Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_PurplesHeroGroup)
                else
                    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_YellowsHeroGroup)
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, udg_FifthEvo)
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_FifthEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthBase), true)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FifthBase, udg_HeroesAndEvos)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(udg_FifthBase, udg_HeroGroup)
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_FifthBase, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FifthEvo, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249))
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(udg_FifthEvo, udg_HeroGroup)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_FifthBase, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_267))
    call SelectUnitForPlayerSingle(udg_FifthEvo, GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthEvo))
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_249), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ReviveHuman\\ReviveHuman.mdl")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Illidan3)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3491")
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_001, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 6.50)
    call TriggerSleepAction(6.50)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, udg_FifthEvo)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3490")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_248), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call ResetToGameCameraForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_FifthEvo), 0)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_FifthBase)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_tp_Illidan)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER, gg_rct_Region_249)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER, function Trig_ILLIDAN_EVO_TRIGGER_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waves Phase 5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waves_Phase_5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3511")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4578")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(23, 'u01N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'n00L', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(35.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(75.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u01N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'n00L', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(20.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_021), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_022), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(45.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u01N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(3, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(55.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(15, 'u01N', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'n00L', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_H09Guardian08)
    call TransmissionFromUnitTypeWithNameBJ(GetPlayersAll(), Player(11), 'U01P', "TRIGSTR_4405", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U01P_0190), gg_snd_H09Guardian08, "TRIGSTR_4408", bj_TIMETYPE_ADD, 0.00, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4406")
    call TriggerSleepAction(9.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4407")
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01P_0190, "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_1))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waves_Phase_5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waves_Phase_5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Waves_Phase_5, gg_unit_U01F_0163, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Waves_Phase_5, function Trig_Waves_Phase_5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

    set gg_trg_Prevent_Kazzak_Leave_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prevent_Kazzak_Leave_2, gg_rct_Region_302)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Prevent_Kazzak_Leave_2, gg_rct_Region_303)
