//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start D5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_D5_Func024A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("foot", GetEnumUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Start_D5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01Q_0005)
    set udg_OrangeKazzakBOOL=false
    set udg_KazzakColourChangeINT=100
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_Timer, "TRIGSTR_5859")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Timer, false, 50.00)
    call TriggerSleepAction(50.00)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ())
    call FogModifierStop(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Region_252)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields)
    set udg_VisibleZone=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
    set udg_JailedGhostsBOOL=true
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0170, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_017))
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_e018_0170, 80.00, 40.00, 0.00, 25.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0191, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_257))
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(gg_unit_e018_0191, 170.00)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_e018_0191, 100.00, 0.00, 0.00, 25.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0193, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_265))
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_e018_0193, 0.00, 100.00, 0.00, 25.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0192, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_269))
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_e018_0192, 0.00, 0.00, 100.00, 25.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Start_D5_Func024A)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Begin)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0170, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_017))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_D5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_D5=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Start_D5, gg_unit_U01P_0190, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_D5, function Trig_Start_D5_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Jails 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_JailedGhostsBOOL == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001Func003Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B01P') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
        call PolledWait(0.05)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has been captured by a ghost! Get a ghost shield and walk up to the gate to save him/her.|r" ) ))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286), 1.00)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0170, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_JailedGhostsBOOL=false
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5873")
            call CreateItemLoc('I003', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        else
        endif
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has killed the Orange Ghost! It will be disabled for 60 seconds.|r" ) ))
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0170, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_e018_0170, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
        call PolledWait(60.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0170, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e018_0170, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_017))
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303|c0096FF96The Orange Ghost has returned.|r" ))
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Jails_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_1, 170.00, gg_unit_e018_0170)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_1, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_1, function Trig_Ghost_Jails_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Jails 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_JailedGhostsBOOL == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002Func003Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B01P') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
        call PolledWait(0.05)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has been captured by a ghost! Get a ghost shield and walk up to the gate to save him/her.|r" ) ))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286), 1.00)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0191, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_JailedGhostsBOOL=false
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5872")
            call CreateItemLoc('I003', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        else
        endif
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has killed the Red Ghost! It will be disabled for 60 seconds.|r" ) ))
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0191, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_e018_0191, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
        call PolledWait(60.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0191, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e018_0191, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_257))
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303|c0096FF96The Red Ghost has returned.|r" ))
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Jails_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_2, 170.00, gg_unit_e018_0191)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_2, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_2, function Trig_Ghost_Jails_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Jails 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_JailedGhostsBOOL == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func003Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GreenKazzakBOOL == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B01P') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
        call PolledWait(0.05)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has been captured by a ghost! Get a ghost shield and walk up to the gate to save him/her.|r" ) ))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286), 1.00)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0193, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_JailedGhostsBOOL=false
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5871")
            call CreateItemLoc('I003', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        else
        endif
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has killed the Green Ghost! It will be disabled for 60 seconds.|r" ) ))
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0193, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_e018_0193, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
        if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Func001Func007C() ) then
            set udg_KazzakColourChangeINT=0
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
            set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
            loop
                exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                set udg_KazzakColourChangeINT=( udg_KazzakColourChangeINT + 10 )
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 100, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 0)
                call TriggerSleepAction(0.05)
                set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
            endloop
            call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, false)
            set udg_GreenKazzakBOOL=false
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5877")
        else
        endif
        call PolledWait(60.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0193, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e018_0193, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_265))
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303|c0096FF96The Green Ghost has returned.|r" ))
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Jails_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_3=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_3, 170.00, gg_unit_e018_0193)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_3, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_3, function Trig_Ghost_Jails_3_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Jails 4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_HeroGroup) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001Func003Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_JailedGhostsBOOL == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001Func003Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B01P') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
        call PolledWait(0.05)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Undead\\UndeadDissipate\\UndeadDissipate.mdl")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has been captured by a ghost! Get a ghost shield and walk up to the gate to save him/her.|r" ) ))
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_286), 1.00)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call GroupAddUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0192, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        if ( Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Func001Func003C() ) then
            set udg_JailedGhostsBOOL=false
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5870")
            call CreateItemLoc('I003', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\ThunderClap\\ThunderClapCaster.mdl")
        else
        endif
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has killed the Blue Ghost! It will be disabled for 60 seconds.|r" ) ))
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_e018_0192, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_286))
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(gg_unit_e018_0192, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 0)
        call PolledWait(60.00)
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(gg_unit_e018_0192, udg_JailedGhostsUNITGROUP)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_e018_0192, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_269))
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303|c0096FF96The Blue Ghost has returned.|r" ))
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Jails_4 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_4=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitInRangeSimple(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_4, 170.00, gg_unit_e018_0192)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_4, Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_4, function Trig_Ghost_Jails_4_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Save Jailed
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Save_Jailed_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B01P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_JailedUNITGROUP) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Save_Jailed_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Save_Jailed_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Save_Jailed_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
endfunction

function Trig_Save_Jailed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( "|c006969FF[Notice]|r - |c00FF0303" + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + "|r |c0096FF96has saved all jailed players.|r" ) ))
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_B001_0731)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_JailedUNITGROUP, function Trig_Save_Jailed_Func004A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2)
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_B001_0731)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Save_Jailed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Save_Jailed=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Save_Jailed, gg_rct_Region_251)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Save_Jailed, Condition(function Trig_Save_Jailed_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Save_Jailed, function Trig_Save_Jailed_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cannot enter jail
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitInGroup(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cannot_enter_jail takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cannot_enter_jail=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Cannot_enter_jail, gg_rct_Region_286)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cannot_enter_jail, Condition(function Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cannot_enter_jail, function Trig_Cannot_enter_jail_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Ghost Shields
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Ghost_Shields_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Ghost_Shields_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Spawn_Ghost_Shields_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('I01B', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_239))
    else
        call CreateItemLoc('I01B', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_250))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Ghost_Shields takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields, 120.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields, function Trig_Spawn_Ghost_Shields_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Roam Kazzak
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Roam_Kazzak_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_252))
    set udg_TransparencyINT=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 100, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), I2R(udg_TransparencyINT))
        set udg_TransparencyINT=( udg_TransparencyINT + 10 )
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_287))
    call PolledWait(5.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_252))
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, "move", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_252))
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=11
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 100, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), I2R(udg_TransparencyINT))
        set udg_TransparencyINT=( udg_TransparencyINT - 10 )
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.20)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Roam_Kazzak takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak, 40.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak, function Trig_Roam_Kazzak_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Spell Roam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Roam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5875")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Spell_Roam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Roam=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Roam, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, LESS_THAN, 125300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Roam, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Roam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Spell Emerald Shield
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_KazzakColourChangeINT=100
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_KazzakColourChangeINT=( udg_KazzakColourChangeINT - 10 )
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 100, I2R(udg_KazzakColourChangeINT), 0.00)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, true)
    set udg_GreenKazzakBOOL=true
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5876")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, LESS_THAN, 95300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Emerald_Shield_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Spell Consume Red Ghost
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, gg_unit_U01Q_0005) + 15000.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", gg_unit_U01Q_0005, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", gg_unit_e018_0191, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5878")
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e018_0191)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, LESS_THAN, 65300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Consume_Red_Ghost_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Spell Cloud of Shadows
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U01Q_0005)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, true)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, "stand victory")
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5879")
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U01Q_0005)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(gg_rct_Region_252, 'WOcw')
    call FogModifierStop(udg_VisibleZone)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, Player(0), FOG_OF_WAR_FOGGED, gg_rct_Region_252)
    set udg_BlackMaskVision=GetLastCreatedFogModifier()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, LESS_THAN, 45300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Cloud_of_Shadows_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Spell Last Stand
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_JailedUNITGROUP)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251), 1.00)
    call UnitRemoveBuffBJ('B01P', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('ACvp', gg_unit_U01Q_0005)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A09A', gg_unit_U01Q_0005)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5880")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, false)
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_240), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
    call FogModifierStop(udg_BlackMaskVision)
    call FogModifierStart(udg_VisibleZone)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(gg_unit_U01Q_0005, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, gg_unit_U01Q_0005) + 50000.00 ))
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e018_0170)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e018_0193)
    call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_e018_0192)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand_Func017A)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_017), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u01O', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_250), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_246), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00S', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_018), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_239), bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_241), bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitLifeEvent(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, LESS_THAN, 10300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand, function Trig_Kazzak_Spell_Last_Stand_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kazzak Minions Send
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kazzak_Minions_Send_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'e018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'U01Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kazzak_Minions_Send_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_251))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kazzak_Minions_Send takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send, gg_rct_Region_252)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send, Condition(function Trig_Kazzak_Minions_Send_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send, function Trig_Kazzak_Minions_Send_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kaazak Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kaazak_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Start_D5)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_3)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Ghost_Jails_4)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Save_Jailed)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Cannot_enter_jail)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_Ghost_Shields)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Roam_Kazzak)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Kazzak_Minions_Send)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_5881")
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_288), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTo.mdl")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kaazak_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kaazak_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Kaazak_Dies, gg_unit_U01Q_0005, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kaazak_Dies, function Trig_Kaazak_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: START ROOM 2 HERE
//
// DELETE CONGRATULATORY MESSAGE FROM TRIGGER KAZZAK DIES
//===========================================================================
function Trig_START_ROOM_2_HERE_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_START_ROOM_2_HERE_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call FogModifierStop(udg_VisibleZone)
    call FogModifierStart(udg_BlackMaskVision)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_START_ROOM_2_HERE takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE, gg_rct_Region_288)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE, Condition(function Trig_START_ROOM_2_HERE_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_START_ROOM_2_HERE, function Trig_START_ROOM_2_HERE_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: test
//===========================================================================
function Trig_test_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_test_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FrostFlowerINT=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_291), I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT))
        set udg_FrostFlowerINT=( R2I(I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT)) + 30 )
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_FrostFlowerINT=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=12
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_291), I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT))
        set udg_FrostFlowerINT=( R2I(I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT)) + 30 )
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.03)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FrostmissileUNITGROUP, function Trig_test_Func006A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_test takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_test=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_test)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_test, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_test, function Trig_test_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lich Spells General
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Func001Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_296))
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), 0.50)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportCaster.mdl")
endfunction

function Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_HeroGroup, function Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Func001Func004A)
    else
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide)
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
        set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=25
        loop
            exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01J', Player(11), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_297), 190.00)
            call TriggerSleepAction(0.07)
            set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
        endloop
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lich_Spells_General takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General, 12.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General, function Trig_Lich_Spells_General_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lich Spell Snowstorm
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U00T_0211, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_291))
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, gg_unit_U00T_0211)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_U00T_0211, "Stand Channel")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_U00T_0211)
    set udg_FrostFlowerINT=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e01J', Player(11), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_291), I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT))
        set udg_FrostFlowerINT=( R2I(I2R(udg_FrostFlowerINT)) + 60 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Lich_Spells_General)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm, function Trig_Lich_Spell_Snowstorm_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lich Terrain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lich_Terrain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_291), 'Nsnw', - 1, 9, 0)
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_292), 'Nsnr', - 1, 1, 0)
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_293), 'Nsnr', - 1, 1, 0)
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_294), 'Nsnr', - 1, 1, 0)
    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_295), 'Ngrs', - 1, 1, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lich_Terrain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lich_Terrain=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Lich_Terrain, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lich_Terrain, function Trig_Lich_Terrain_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Missiles
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_FrostmissileUNITGROUP)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Missiles takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Missiles=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles, gg_rct_Region_297)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles, function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Missiles Temp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Temp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Temp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_FrostmissileUNITGROUP)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Missiles_Temp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp, gg_rct_Region_296)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Temp_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_Temp, function Trig_Frost_Missiles_Temp_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Missiles slide
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Missiles_slide_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), 30.00, GetUnitFacing(GetEnumUnit())))
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Missiles_slide_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_FrostmissileUNITGROUP, function Trig_Frost_Missiles_slide_Func001A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Missiles_slide takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_slide, function Trig_Frost_Missiles_slide_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Missiles remove
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Missiles_remove_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Missiles_remove_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Missiles_remove takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, gg_rct_Region_298)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, gg_rct_Region_299)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, gg_rct_Region_300)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, gg_rct_Region_301)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Missiles_remove_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Missiles_remove, function Trig_Frost_Missiles_remove_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetTerrainTypeBJ(GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_307), 'Dlvc', - 1, 6, 0)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: KaliTDMULTIBOARD
//===========================================================================
function Trig_KaliTDMULTIBOARD_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(1, 1, "TRIGSTR_2484")
    set udg_KaliTDMultiBOARD=GetLastCreatedMultiboard()
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(udg_KaliTDMultiBOARD, 1, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\WorldEditUI\\Editor-MultipleUnits.blp")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_KaliTDMULTIBOARD takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_KaliTDMULTIBOARD=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_KaliTDMULTIBOARD)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_KaliTDMULTIBOARD, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_KaliTDMULTIBOARD, function Trig_KaliTDMULTIBOARD_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_Unit_KaliTD_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_Unit_KaliTD_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_KaliTDUNITs)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD, Condition(function Trig_Add_Unit_KaliTD_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_Unit_KaliTD, function Trig_Add_Unit_KaliTD_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove Dead Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_Dead_Units_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(11) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Remove_Dead_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_KaliTDUNITs)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_Dead_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units, Condition(function Trig_Remove_Dead_Units_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_Dead_Units, function Trig_Remove_Dead_Units_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Defeat Chance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defeat_Chance_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KaliTDUNITs) > 80 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_Chance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2483")
    call TriggerSleepAction(12.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defeat_Chance takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defeat_Chance=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance, Condition(function Trig_Defeat_Chance_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Defeat_Chance, function Trig_Defeat_Chance_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Defeat KaliTD
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defeat_KaliTD_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_KaliTDUNITs) > 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defeat_KaliTD_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Defeat_KaliTD_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2474")
        call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(0), "TRIGSTR_2475")
        call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(1), "TRIGSTR_2476")
        call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(2), "TRIGSTR_2477")
        call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(3), "TRIGSTR_2479")
        call CustomDefeatBJ(Player(4), "TRIGSTR_2480")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defeat_KaliTD takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD, gg_rct_Region_205)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Defeat_KaliTD, function Trig_Defeat_KaliTD_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Map_Initialization)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_SetTips)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Player_1_Open)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Player_2_Open)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Player_3_Open)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Player_4_Open)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Player_5_Open)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_QL)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Ne_Maze_Catas)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Upgrades
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitUpgrades_Player11 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(11), 'Recb', 1)
endfunction

function InitUpgrades takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(11), 'Recb', 1) // INLINED!!
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(0), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 1
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(1), ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(1), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(1), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(1), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 2
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(2), ConvertPlayerColor(2))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(2), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(2), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(2), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 3
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(3), ConvertPlayerColor(3))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(3), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(3), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(3), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 4
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(4), ConvertPlayerColor(4))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(4), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(4), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(4), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 5
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(5), ConvertPlayerColor(5))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(5), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(5), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(5), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 10
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 6)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 6)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(10))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(10), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(10), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(10), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

    // Player 11
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 7)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 7)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(11), ConvertPlayerColor(11))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(11), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(11), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(11), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER)

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_6484
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(1), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(2), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(3), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(4), 0)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(5), 0)

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(4), true)

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(4), true)

    // Force: TRIGSTR_304
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(10), 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(11), 1)

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(10), true)

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(10), true)

endfunction

function InitAllyPriorities takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(0, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 3, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(1, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 3, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(2, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 3, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(3, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 2, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 3, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(4, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 2, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 3, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds(- 5376.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), - 9728.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 5376.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 9216.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), - 5376.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 9216.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 5376.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), - 9728.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM))
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranTerrain\\DNCDalaranTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranUnit\\DNCDalaranUnit.mdl")
    call NewSoundEnvironment("Default")
    call SetAmbientDaySound("DalaranRuinsDay")
    call SetAmbientNightSound("DalaranRuinsNight")
    call SetMapMusic("Music", true, 0)
    call InitSounds()
    call CreateRegions()
    call CreateCameras()
    call SetPlayerTechResearched(Player(11), 'Recb', 1) // INLINED!!
    call CreateAllDestructables()
    call CreateAllItems()
    call CreateAllUnits()
    call InitBlizzard()


    call InitGlobals()
    call InitCustomTriggers()
    call RunInitializationTriggers()

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName("TRIGSTR_180")
    call SetMapDescription("TRIGSTR_182")
    call SetPlayers(8)
    call SetTeams(8)
    call SetGamePlacement(MAP_PLACEMENT_TEAMS_TOGETHER)

    call DefineStartLocation(0, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(1, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(2, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(3, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(4, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(5, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(6, 0.0, 2624.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(7, 0.0, 2624.0)

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots()
    call InitCustomTeams()
    call InitAllyPriorities()
endfunction
